senses.definition: 香港巴士術語，指嗰啲行車路線好長，幾乎每個巴士站都有乘客上落嘅巴士路線。呢啲路線通常歷史比較耐，係以前道路網絡未咁發達嗰陣嘅產物，經過多年嚟合併其他路線而變得越嚟越長。乘客通常只會搭幾個站，好少會坐足全程。 (Hong Kong bus slang, refers to a bus route that is very long and has passengers getting on and off at almost every stop. These routes are often long-established, a product of a time when the road network was less developed, and have become progressively longer over the years through mergers with other routes. Passengers typically only travel for a few stops rather than the entire journey.)

senses.definition: 清除面上嘅#妝 (to remove make-up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 落妝前後個樣真係好大分別。
examples.jyutping: lok6 zong1 cin4 hau6 go3 joeng2 zan1 hai6 hou2 daai6 fan1 bit6.
examples.translation: The appearance differs a lot before and after removing the make-up.

senses.definition: 形容電腦設備或者網絡運作緩慢，反應停滯 (slow; laggy; usually referring to computers networks or computing devices)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我部電腦打機好lag，係時候換新機。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou6 din6 nou5 daa2 gei1 hou2 lek1, hai6 si4 hau6 wun6 san1 gei1.
examples.translation: My computer is slow when playing games. It's time to replace with a new one.

phonetic.original: laap6 fong1 gung1 cek3:lap6 fong1 gung1 cek3

senses.definition: #體積 單位；相等於一個長、闊、高都係一#公尺 嘅#立方體 嘅體積 (cubic metre)
senses.label: 量詞

keywords: laap6 fong1 gung1 cek3:lap6 fong1 gung1 cek3

senses.definition: 由六個正方形組成嘅立體，每兩個相鄰正方形互相垂直 （量詞：個） (cube, a solid bounded by six equal squares)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一個立方體有六塊一樣嘅面。
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 laap6 fong1 tai2 jau5 luk6 faai3 jat1 joeng2 ge3 min2.
examples.translation: A cube possesses six identical sides.

senses.definition: 公制長度單位，一百厘米等於一#米，符號係 #cm (centimetre)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: coeng4 fong1 jing4 fut3 ng5 lei4 mai5.
examples.translation: The rectangle is 5 cm wide.

senses.definition: #體積 單位；等於長、闊、高都係一米嘅體積，亦即係一米嘅三次方；有時會叫做#立方公尺 (cubic metre)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 用針線將啲嘢連結埋一齊 (to stitch; to sew)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢撞到個頭，入醫院聯咗三針。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zong6 dou2 go3 tau2, jap6 ji1 jyun2 lyun4 zo2 saam1 zam1.
examples.translation: He hurt his head and received three stitches in the hospital.

senses.definition: 電力系統、#電器 由於入水、損毀、接駁錯誤等嘅原因，令外殼或者其他金屬部分帶電，有#電流 通過流到地下，畀人掂到就會#觸電 (eletrical earth leakage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: residual current device

senses.definition: #英國 城市名；位於#英格蘭 東北部沿海，係重要嘅#港口 (Liverpool)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一間位於同市嘅#球會，現時參與#英超 聯賽 (Liverpool FC)
動物名；一種#鯨魚，係世界上已知最大嘅動物 (blue whale)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟記錄聲音嘅#磁帶，通常有長方形硬殼（量詞：餅／盒） (magnetic tape; cassette tape)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 軍隊嘅編制單位；一個連由三個#排 組成，加上其他後勤、幹部人員，人數大約係120人左右（量詞：個） ((military) company)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Lin")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 外加某啲嘢做媒介，將一啲嘢接駁埋一齊 (to link; to join)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lin4 sing4 jat1 tiu4 sin3
examples.translation: to join with a line

senses.definition: 一個跟住一個，中間冇停過；#連續 (one after another; in succession)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: lin4 daa2 saam1 coeng4 bo1, jiu3 tau2 tau2.
examples.translation: We've played three ball games in succession, so we need a rest.

senses.definition: 後面加上某個人或者某樣嘢，表示佢亦唔例外；#就算 係；通常後面會有「#都」 (even; indicates that someone or something is no exception; usually precedes #都 dou1)

examples.text: 佢設計出一個連老人家都鍾意嘅遊戲。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cit3 gai3 ceot1 jat1 go3 lin4 lou5 jan4 gaa1 dou1 zung1 ji3 ge3 jau4 hei3.
examples.translation: He designed a game even the elderly will like.

senses.definition: 掛起衣物去風乾、曬乾 (to hang clothes to dry; to sun clothes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: long6 saam1 sing2
examples.translation: clothesline

senses.definition: #晾衫 嗰陣用嚟夾實啲衫褲嘅#夾（量詞：隻） (clothes peg; clothespin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #南美洲 同#中美洲，因為多數國家都講西班牙文同葡萄牙文等拉丁語族嘅語言而得名 (Latin America)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 五穀類食物之一，類似麪食，將米磨成粉再搓成條狀整出嚟，粗過 #米粉（量詞：碗／箸） (lai-fun: Asian rice noodles that is smooth, translucent and round in shape)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 wun2 siu1 ngo4 laai6 fan2
examples.translation: a bowl of roost goose lai-fun

senses.definition: 0，比所有#負數 大，比所有#正數 細嘅數字；大寫作「零」、小寫作「〇」 (zero, the number)
senses.label: 數詞

examples.jyutping: sip3 si6 ling4 dou6
examples.translation: zero degree Celsius

senses.definition: 冇嘢 (nothing)

examples.jyutping: jau4 ling4 hoi1 ci2
examples.translation: to start from scratch

senses.definition: 令表達數字時更加清晰嘅用字，用嚟分隔#整數 同#小數 部分，或者分隔相差至少兩個位嘅數目 (used before the smallest digit in a large number with non-neighbouring base numerals as digits, or sometimes used in a phrase with neighbouring measure words)

examples.jyutping: saam1 maan6 ling4 luk6 sap6
examples.translation: thirty thousand and sixty

senses.definition: 某幾種#鼠 科動物嘅俗稱，主要係褐家鼠，喺城市、農場常見嘅品種，通常視為對人類有危害（量詞：隻） (mouse, rat, of those which live in cities)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lou5 syu2 gaau1
examples.translation: mouse glue trap

senses.definition: （電腦或智能設備等等）讀取或者轉移資料 (to load up something on the computer (and smart devices), e.g. to load up an application, to download something from the internet, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我部機開機嗰陣喺Windows畫面load好耐，係咪俾人hack咗？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou6 gei1 hoi1 gei1 go2 zan2 hai2 windows waa2 min2 lou1 zo2 hou2 noi6, hai6 mai6 bei2 jan4 hek1 zo2?
examples.translation: My computer is stuck in the Windows screen for a long time while booting up, is it hacked?

senses.definition: 諗，理解，明白 (to think, to understand, to comprehend)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zung6 mei6 lou1 dou2.
examples.translation: I haven't figured it out yet.

senses.definition: 打機術語，即係#等級 (level)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: sing1 le1
examples.translation: to level up

senses.definition: 響街邊流連、挨住或坐住欄杆無所事事嘅#飛仔 (teddy boys that linger on street and lean on or sit on the street banisters for whole day; literally, banister teddy boys)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢以前成日放學就走去做欄杆飛，周街撩女仔，估唔到依家做咗大學教授。
examples.translation: In the past, he was a street hooligan who would lean on railings and flirt with passing girls. No one could have expected that he would now be a university lecturer.

senses.definition: 唔順暢，唔工整，凹凹凸凸，亦都引伸為講嘢窒吓窒吓，口齒不清嘅意思 (rough; not smooth; bumpy; hesitating or stuttering; unable to speak a sentence very well.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 乜你講句嘢都講到甩甩咳咳㗎！
examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 gong2 geoi3 je5 dou1 gong2 dou3 lak1 lak1 kak1 kak1 gaa3!
examples.translation: Why are you struggling to speak even a simple sentence?

senses.definition: 燒著嘢嘅臭味（量詞：浸） (burning smell; smell of something burning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我聞到有𤓓味，係咪啲飯燒燶咗？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 man4 dou2 jau5 lo3 mei6, hai6 mai6 di1 faan6 siu1 nung1 zo2?
examples.translation: I smell something burnt, is the rice burnt?

senses.definition: 引申為大事不妙既兆頭、風聲 (figuratively, sign of something bad happening)

examples.text: 呢單嘢大家一早已經聞到𤓓味，但由於總裁力推，大家唯有硬食。
examples.translation: Since day one of this project everyone has a feeling that something bad is happening, but as the director has pushed hard on it, all have to do it reluctantly.

senses.definition: 離開，唔再屬於某一件事、一個組織，通常會覺得放鬆、開心 (to get rid of something; to be no longer involved in something; to get out of trouble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你揾人做替死鬼，你咪可以甩身囉！
examples.jyutping: nei5 wan2 jan4 zou6 tai3 sei2 gwai2, nei5 mai6 ho2 ji5 lat1 san1 lo1!
examples.translation: If you use someone as a scapegoat, you can get out of trouble.

senses.definition: 學術上帶有研究性質嘅著作，例如實驗報告，論文等 (academic writings)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢好勤力㗎，論著起碼成千篇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 kan4 lik6 gaa3, leon6 zyu3 hei2 maa5 seng4 cin1 pin1.
examples.translation: He is really hard working, and has written at least a thousand scholarly articles.

senses.definition: 組織小圈子 (to form a faction or a clique)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 辦公室個個都熱衷於拉幫結派，我點先可以獨善其身呢？
examples.jyutping: baan6 gung1 sat1 go3 go3 dou1 jit6 cung1 jyu1 laai1 bong1 git3 paai3, ngo5 dim2 sin1 ho2 ji5 duk6 sin6 kei4 san1 ne1?
examples.translation: Everyone in the office is keen to form cliques. How can I avoid getting involved?

senses.definition: 獨立於肉體嘅精神、靈魂；死者存在嘅形態 (spirit; something that many religions believe continue to exist after the body dies; the form of a dead person, similar to a ghost)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 高街喺二戰後陰氣好重，成日有靈體出沒。
examples.jyutping: gou1 gaai1 hai2 ji6 zin3 hau6 jam1 hei3 hou2 cung5, seng4 jat6 jau5 ling4 tai2 ceot1 mut6.
examples.translation: The High Street has an eerie vibe after World War II, with many ghosts roaming around.

senses.definition: 樣貌娟好嘅女性（量詞：個） (beautiful girl; pretty young lady)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲人話呢間大學好多靚女。
examples.jyutping: di1 jan4 waa6 ni1 gaan1 daai6 hok6 hou2 do1 leng3 neoi2.
examples.translation: People say there are many pretty girls in this university.

senses.definition: 對一般成年女性嘅稱呼，通常見於市井或非正式場合 (informal address for an adult woman)

examples.jyutping: aa3 leng3 neoi2, gon1 caau2 ngau4 ho2 m4 goi1!
examples.translation: Hi (waitress), a dish of stir-fried flat noodles with beef please!

senses.definition: #白粥 嘅俗稱（量詞：個／碗） (colloquial address for plain congee)
冇#鞋帶 嘅#鞋（量詞：隻／對） (slip-on shoe; loafer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我好憎綁鞋帶，就轉咗着懶佬鞋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 zang1 bong2 haai4 daai2, zau6 zyun3 zo2 zoek6 laan5 lou2 haai4.
examples.translation: I hate tying my shoes, and switched to wearing slip-ons.

senses.definition: 生手、唔純熟、冇經驗嘅後生仔；又指小人物，小角色（量詞：條） (a teenage boy or young man, a "kid", a "guy"; a term of address, "hey kid"; a useless guy, a nobody; an inexperienced guy, green boy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tiu1! jyun4 loi4 hai6 tiu4 faa1 leng1 keng1.
examples.translation: Ah, just a kid!

senses.definition: 一種量度、表示物理量嘅方法，有連續嘅數字變化值；相對「#數碼 」 (analogue)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: analogue signal

senses.definition: 形容一對情侶之中，男子才華洋溢，女子容貌出眾 (an ideal couple)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 喺舉出一樣或以上嘅例子之前會噉講 (for example; such as)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 我鍾意食生果，例如蘋果、橙、香蕉。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zung1 ji3 sik6 saang1 gwo2, lai6 jyu4 ping4 gwo2, caang2, hoeng1 ziu1.
examples.translation: I like fruits, such as apples, oranges and banana.

senses.definition: 用嚟帶出一啲假設 (for example; for instance; imagine if)

examples.text: 你唔知邊個重要啲？噉我想問下你，例如，你老母同你老婆一齊跌落水，你會救邊個先？
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 zi1 bin1 go3 zung6 jiu3 di1? gam2 ngo5 soeng2 man6 haa5 nei5, lai6 jyu4, nei5 lou5 mou2 tung4 nei5 lou5 po4 jat1 cai4 dit3 lok6 seoi2, nei5 wui5 gau3 bin1 go3 sin1?
examples.translation: If you can't tell who's more important, let me ask you this: Let's say your mom and wife fell into water at the same time, who would you save first?

senses.definition: 唔覺意咁講咗秘密俾人聽 (to let slip a secret inadvertently. Literally: to let the wind out of one's mouth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個明星一向將自己婚姻狀況保密，如果唔係佢朋友漏口風，外間都唔知原來佢已經有個仔。
examples.translation: The marital status of this superstar has been kept confidential throughout all these years, if not his friend let slip the secret, no outsiders will know he's already had a son.

senses.definition: 知情者刻意咁披露暫時未能公佈而大眾又關注嘅消息一部份，作為對民意反應嘅測試，類似#放風 (insider provide pieces of information of some public concerned issue deliberately, to work as a test to the response of public opinion.)

examples.text: 財政司早幾日漏咗口風話考慮緊加差餉，搞到啲業主鬼殺咁嘈話要抗議。
examples.translation: The financial secretary has let slip the proposal of raising property rates, which has caused many homeowners to complain and protest.

senses.definition: 人到老年先嚟戀愛 (romance of elderly)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 由後生忙到退休，臨老入花叢其實都唔怪得。
examples.jyutping: jau4 hau6 saang1 mong4 dou3 teoi3 jau1, lam4 lou5 jap6 faa1 cung4 kei4 sat6 dou1 m4 gwaai3 dak1.
examples.translation: Being busy from a young age until his retirement, it's not a surprised he started a romance in old age.

senses.definition: 被好多人以唔同方式嘲笑 (to taunt; to jeer at)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢俾女人呃晒啲錢，而家去到度度都俾人冷嘲熱諷。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 neoi5 jan2 aak1 saai3 di1 cin2, ji4 gaa1 heoi3 dou3 dou6 dou6 dou1 bei2 jan4 laang5 zaau1 jit6 fung3.
examples.translation: His fortune was swindled by women, and now he's mocked wherever he goes.

senses.definition: 指外貌清純、看似善良，但擅於心計嘅女仔 (conniving little bitch; girl in sheep's clothing; literally: green tea bitch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 係咪個綠茶婊教唆你咁做㗎？
examples.translation: Did that conniving bitch manipulate you into doing this?

senses.definition: 同#狼死 (see #狼死)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 就算佢得罪過你，你都唔使打得咁狼架！
examples.jyutping: zau6 syun3 keoi5 dak1 zeoi6 gwo3 nei5, nei5 dou1 m4 sai2 daa2 dak1 gam3 long4 gaa2!
examples.translation: Even if he wronged you, you don't have to beat him up so badly!

senses.definition: 的士司機術語，即係#收工 (taxi driver jargon, to stop working)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: My shift has ended, I'm done for the day.

senses.definition: 唔着衫噉#游水 (to go skinny dipping)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個係私人泳池嚟㗎，你裸泳都冇人理。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 hai6 si1 jan4 wing6 ci4 lei4 gaa3, nei5 lo2 wing6 dou1 mou5 jan4 lei5.
examples.translation: This is a private swimming pool. You can swim naked here without anyone minding.

senses.definition: #漫畫 書；用一系列圖畫講故事嘅書（量詞：本） (comic book)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 淨係掛住睇連環圖，唔怪得考試零分。
examples.jyutping: zing6 hai6 gwaa3 zyu6 tai2 lin4 waan4 tou4, m4 gwaai3 dak1 haau2 si5 ling4 fan1.
examples.translation: The reason you got zero on the exam is because you were reading comics instead of studying.

senses.definition: 用一串有先後次序嘅圖畫，去講故事嘅表達手法，又叫連環漫畫、連環畫 (comic strip; comic mode story telling)

examples.translation: comic mode story

senses.definition: 稍為；稍微 (slightly; a little bit)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 份合約呢度你略為改一下。
examples.jyutping: fan6 hap6 joek3 ni1 dou6 nei5 loek6 wai4 goi2 jat1 haa5.
examples.translation: Please make a slight change here on this contract.

senses.definition: 唔同嘅嘢放埋一齊，冇分開到 (to be mixed up; to mingle with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 哥哥同細佬啲襪撈亂晒喇！你分返開佢啦！
examples.jyutping: go4 go1 tung4 sai3 lou2 di1 mat6 lou1 lyun6 saai3 laa3! nei5 fan1 faan1 hoi1 keoi5 laa1!
examples.translation: The brothers' socks are all mixed up! Please sort them back into the right pile!

senses.definition: 太過相似，令人搞錯#邊個打邊個 (to mix up with; to confuse with)

examples.text: 呢對孖女好似樣，唔識佢哋嘅人好容易將佢哋撈亂。
examples.jyutping: ni1 deoi3 maa1 neoi2 hou2 ci5 joeng2, m4 sik1 keoi5 dei6 ge3 jan4 hou2 jung4 ji6 zoeng1 keoi5 dei6 lou1 lyun6.
examples.translation: The twin girls are very much alike. Those who don't know them would easily mix them up.

senses.definition: #流眼淚 (to weep; to cry; literally: horse's urine flowing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咪流馬尿啦，畀人睇到唔好睇啊。
examples.jyutping: mai5 lau4 maa5 niu6 laa1, bei2 jan4 tai2 dou2 m4 hou2 tai2 aa3.
examples.translation: Stop crying, it's embarrassing.

senses.definition: 令某人冇面、難堪 (to cause shame for (somebody))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam2 zou6 hou2 lok6 aa3 ming4 min2 wo3.
examples.translation: He deliberately did that to embarrass Ah-Ming.

senses.definition: #符碌 咁通過（考試，課程等） (to luckily pass (exam, course, etc))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 luk1 gwo3 ni1 fo1 syun3.
examples.translation: I'm just trying to get by with minimum effort for this course.

senses.definition: 臨時演員，多數飾演啲冇咩對白、無關重要嘅小角色（量詞：個） (an "extra" in a film; someone hired a very minor role, e.g. in crowd scenes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽日嗰場要二百個臨記扮學生，你同我揾班臨記嚟開工啦！
examples.jyutping: ting1 jat6 go2 coeng4 jiu3 ji6 baak3 go3 lam4 gei3 baan6 hok6 saang1, nei5 tung4 ngo5 wan2 baan1 lam4 gei3 lei4 hoi1 gung1 laa1!
examples.translation: We needs 200 extras tomorrow for the roles of students, do me a favour and call a bunch of extras to come to work.

senses.definition: 電影之中比較悶嘅片段，通常借指社交場合之中無人出聲，好尷尬嘅場面。（量詞:個） (a boring scene from a movie; literally: cold field)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢齣戲緊張刺激，保證絕冇冷場。
examples.translation: This film is exciting and stimulating. I can guarantee there are no dull moments.

senses.definition: 將#生果、瓜肉用#鹽#糖 醃製，風乾而成嘅#零食，常見嘅有陳皮、#話梅、八仙果、檸檬乾 (pickled fruits, such as sun-dried mandarin peel, dried plum, dried Buddha's hand citron, and dried lemon)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 持續增多，越嚟越大 (to accumulate)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將前段時間嘅力量留喺後段時間使用；多數用於比賽 (a strategy to play defensively in the beginning, and then fight hard in the later stages; usually used in contexts of competitions)

examples.text: 新老細份人鍾意做實事，搞到嗰隻馬屁精今日奶晒鞋底。

examples.translation: The new boss prefers substance over superficiality; therefore, the sycophant is having a rough day.

senses.definition: #捐 個頭入去、攝個上身入去狹窄地方；用頭或面靠近、磨擦；類似#哄 (to enter a hole with the head first; to squeeze the upper body into a narrow gap; also can refer to crowding in next to or brushing against someone with the head or face)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰便咁多人，你𨀤入去做乜唧？
examples.jyutping: go2 bin6 gam3 do1 jan4, nei5 leoi1 jap6 heoi3 zou6 mat1 zek1?
examples.translation: Why are you squeezing in there given that it's so crowded?

senses.definition: #蜷縮 住個身瞓喺一個地方 (to curl up; to huddle somewhere to sleep)

examples.text: 星期日最正就係𨀤響張牀瞓餐飽。
examples.jyutping: sing1 kei4 jat6 zeoi3 zing3 zau6 hai6 leoi1 hoeng2 zoeng1 cong4 fan3 caan1 baau2.
examples.translation: The greatest enjoyment on Sundays is to curl up in bed and sleep as much as you want.

senses.definition: 身體忽然乏力向前跌倒，膝頭同上半身都掂到地，或蜷縮住咁瞓咗響地 (to collapse suddenly due to exhaustion, with both the knees and upper body making contact with the ground, or assuming a fetal position)

examples.text: 佢尋日行行吓街忽然心口痛到#𨀤低 咗。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cam4 jat6 haang4 haang4 haa5 gaai1 fat1 jin4 sam1 hau2 tung3 dou3 leoi1 dai1 zo2.
examples.translation: Yesterday, he suddenly collapsed in the street due to severe chest pain.

senses.definition: 光滑而發光 (smooth and bright; shiny; glossy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢好鍾意佢架車，次都洗到架車令立立。
examples.translation: He loves his car, and washes the car shiny every time.

senses.definition: 同#螺絲 共用嘅固定用工具，外形就好似個圓圈咁，中間個窿內側有螺紋，可以畀大細相符嘅螺絲鑽入去之後扭實固定（量詞：粒） (nut (for screws), a kind of hardware)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同#螺絲 共用嘅固定用工具，外形就好似個圓圈咁，中間個窿內側有螺紋，可以畀大細相符嘅螺絲鑽入去之後扭實固定（量詞：粒） (nut (for screws), a kind of hardware)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋要扭實粒螺絲帽先得。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jiu3 nau2 sat6 nap1 lo4 si1 mou2 sin1 dak1.
examples.translation: Make sure to screw the nut tight.

senses.definition: 香港唯一合法嘅#彩票，由香港賽馬會做莊；一條注可以買 6 個號碼，估中晒 6 個普通號碼就中頭獎（量詞：張／條） (Mark Six: popular lottery game in Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: soeng2 zung3 luk6 hap6 coi2? faat3 mung6 laa1.
examples.translation: You want to win the first prize in Mark Six? Not in your dreams!

senses.definition: 對一個人使用#降頭 (to tame head; to use Gong Tau (a black magic commonly found in Southeast Asia) against someone; to curse)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢去旅行嗰陣畀人落咗降頭。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 heoi3 leoi5 hang4 go2 zan6 bei2 jan4 lok6 zo2 gong3 tau4.
examples.translation: He was put under a curse during his trip.

senses.definition: 離開車廂 (to get off a vehicle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 ce1 tai4 si6
examples.translation: alighting reminder

senses.definition: 傢俬一種，將多個牀架疊起，等多啲人可以瞓嘅牀（量詞：張） (bunk bed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢間宿舍一間房放兩張碌架牀，可以住四個人。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 suk1 se5 jat1 gaan1 fong2 fong3 loeng5 zoeng1 luk1 gaa2 cong4, ho2 ji5 zyu6 sei3 go3 jan4.
examples.translation: This dormitory has two bunk beds per room, accommodating four people in total.

senses.definition: 為咗得到一啲嘢而發爛渣瞓喺地下賴死 (to try to get what one wants by getting down on the floor and throwing a tantrum)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿仔成日扭計買玩具，郁啲就𦧲地大喊。
examples.jyutping: aa3 zai2 sing4 jat6 nau2 gai2 maai5 wun6 geoi6, juk1 di1 zau6 loe2 dei2 daai6 haam3.
examples.translation: My boy always throws a tantrum for toys, squirming and yelling on the floor at the slightest desire.

senses.definition: 引申為咗要人妥協而撒賴、死纏，唔肯罷休 (to latch on and persist in asking for something; to "not take no for an answer")

examples.text: 你哋唔係咁天真諗住𦧲下地，老師就會加返分畀你呀嘛？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 m4 hai6 gam3 tin1 zan1 nam2 zyu6 loe2 haa5 dei2, lou5 si1 zau6 wui5 gaa1 faan1 fan1 bei2 nei5 aa6 maa5?
examples.translation: Are you really so naive to think the teacher will give you extra marks if you keep bothering her?

senses.definition: 用嚟叫人更正啱啱唔吉利嘅説話，重新講過其他合適嘅嘢 (used to tell someone to take back words that are unlucky or inauspicious; literally, to spit out saliva and say it differently)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做咩話自己就嚟死？𦧲口水講過！
examples.jyutping: zou6 me1 waa6 zi6 gei2 zau6 lai4 sei2? loe1 hau2 seoi2 gong2 gwo3!
examples.translation: Why would you say that you're about to die? Take it back and say something else!

senses.definition: 對傳授知識、技藝嘅人嘅尊稱（量詞：個／位） (teacher)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fu6 dou6 lou5 si1
examples.translation: (attached to each class of a secondary school) guidance teacher

senses.definition: 將#濕 嘅物件#晾 喺度，暴露喺空中，藉熱力、空氣流動帶走水份，令佢變#乾 (to dry in the air; to dry by hanging)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: long6 gon1 di1 saam1
examples.translation: to hang dry the clothes

senses.definition: 插喺副詞「#咁」、「#好」、「#幾」、「#勁」、「#最」，同形容詞之間，表示程度強烈 (infix between adverbs, including #咁 gam3, #好 hou2, #幾 gei2, #勁 ging6 or #最 zeoi3, and adjectives to denote a strong degree)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 lan2 gui6.
examples.translation: I am extremely tired.

senses.definition: 插喺否定副詞「#唔」、「#咪」，同動詞、形容詞之間，加強否定語氣 (infix between negation adverbs like #唔 m4 and #咪 mai5, and verbs / adjectives to intensify negation; "not ... at all"; "extremely not")

examples.text: 唔撚知啊！唔撚記得喇！唔撚想同你講嘢，咪撚煩我！
examples.jyutping: m4 lan2 zi1 aa3! m4 lan2 gei3 dak1 laa3! m4 lan2 soeng2 tung4 nei5 gong2 je5, mai5 lan2 faan4 ngo5!
examples.translation: I don't fucking know! I don't fucking remember! I don't fucking wanna speak with you, don't fucking bother me!

senses.definition: 插喺褒義或含肯定義嘅形容詞、動詞第一個音節之後，用作否定 (affixed to negate any adjective or verb with a positive or affirmative connotation, after its first syllable; "not fucking ... at all"; "fucking not"; "fuck-all")

examples.text: 我生日你送張紙巾畀我？真係多撚謝喎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 saang1 jat6 nei5 sung3 zoeng1 zi2 gan1 bei2 ngo5? zan1 hai6 do1 lan2 ze6 wo3.
examples.translation: So this tissue is my birthday present? Thanks for nothing.

senses.definition: 插喺若干非褒義形容詞、副詞、代詞、述賓式動詞第一個音節之後，加強貶義（喺上述咁多個義項中，會排得前過同類嘅「#柒」、「#鳩」、「#閪」。） (infix used to strengthen the negative connotation after the first syllable of certain non-positive adjectives, adverbs, pronouns, or predicate-object compound verbs (In the senses above, the affix precedes its equivalents #柒 cat6, #鳩 gau1 and #閪 hai1.))

examples.jyutping: ci1 lan2 sin3
examples.translation: fucking crazy

senses.definition: 加喺某範疇後面，表示對佢有興趣或者執著嘅人，通常指男性；有時帶侮辱成份，但有時中性；亦都延伸出#L、#J、#JJ 呢啲委婉語 ((suffix) a person who is strongly identified with, or focuses on, a particular field or subject, usually male; can be derogatory or neutral depending on context; may also be expressed in its euphemisms #L, #J and #JJ)

examples.jyutping: zit3 hok6 lan2
examples.translation: philosophy dude

senses.definition: 預計咗嘅事情終於嚟臨，例如指預計到嘅內急或腹痛，又或者重頭戲 ((of something foreseeable) to finally arrive; for example, the call of nature or the highlight of a performance)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 又嚟料𠻹，我去個廁所先，轉頭返嚟！
examples.jyutping: jau6 lai4 liu2 tim1, ngo5 heoi3 go3 ci3 so2 sin1, zyun3 tau4 faan1 lai4
examples.translation: I feel the need to go to the bathroom again. Be right back!

senses.definition: #強制 (to force (certain measures))
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: lak6 ling6
examples.translation: to force someone to do something

senses.definition: 形容喺整體以外被遺下嘅少數 (a small fraction being apart from the whole and left behind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 邊個執顏色筆咁無手尾？零零丁丁淨返幾隻支響度，下個同學用咪無左幾隻色囉。
examples.translation: Who didn't pack up the color pencils properly? The next student to use them might find some missing.

senses.definition: #謀生、闖#江湖；有時指用不法手段#揾錢，近似#做世界 (to make a living; sometimes means to earn money through tricks or crime. Literally: to do the world)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 撈世界要醒目，一於當玩把戲。
examples.jyutping: lou1 sai3 gaai3 jiu3 sing2 muk6, jat1 jyu1 dong1 waan2 baa2 hei3.
examples.translation: To make money you need to be smart, just like playing a game.

senses.definition: 及時做到某件事，冇遲 (in time)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你嚟唔嚟得切寫好份報告㗎？得返兩三日咋噃。
examples.translation: Can you finish the report in time? There are only two to three days left.

senses.definition: #小號，或指一種管樂器 (trumpet; brass instrument in general)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ceoi1 laa3 baa1
examples.translation: to blow a trumpet

senses.definition: 影音器材入面出聲（發出聲音）嘅部件，又叫做擴音器或者#揚聲器；可以係嵌落電視、手機等電子器材，亦都可以係單獨嘅配件，連接電子器材嚟到出聲（量詞：個） (loudspeaker)

examples.jyutping: laam4 ngaa4 laa3 baa1
examples.translation: bluetooth loudspeaker

senses.definition: 拖累團隊 ((of a team member) burdensome; detrimental)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nei1 tiu4 jau5 zan1 hai6 hou2 leoi4.
examples.translation: He's really not a good team player.

senses.definition: 攞#彩頭，指奪得勝利、爭取殊榮 (to win honour, to gain glory (in a contest or a fight); literally: to get colour)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 又指#炫耀、出鋒頭；#攞威 (to seek the limelight; to show off)

examples.text: 間垃圾學校平時唔鼓勵學生打波，人哋成功咗就衝出嚟攞彩。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 laap6 saap3 hok6 haau6 ping4 si4 m4 gu2 lai6 hok6 saang1 daa2 bo1, jan4 dei6 sing4 gung1 zo2 zau6 cung1 ceot1 lei4 lo2 coi2.
examples.translation: That school had never encouraged its basketball team, yet it promptly claimed credit when they succeeded.

senses.definition: 冇主人#養，周圍#流浪 嘅#狗（量詞：隻） (homeless dog; stray dog)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個公園啲流浪狗好惡。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gung1 jyun2 di1 lau4 long6 gau2 hou2 ok3.
examples.translation: The stray dogs in this park are aggressive.

senses.definition: 已經冇用或者唔想要，俾人棄置咗嘅嘢（量詞：嚿／袋） (rubbish; garbage; trash)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: laap6 saap3 tung2
examples.translation: rubbish bin

senses.definition: 引申指#冇用、冇價值嘅#人、#事 或者#內容 (gibberish; unworthy; nonce)

examples.text: 我真係覺得自己係垃圾。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zan1 hai6 gok3 dak1 zi6 gei2 hai6 laap6 saap3.
examples.translation: I do feel that I am trash.

senses.definition: 去#辣 㷫、#挑釁 第個，令到#火藥味 濃，甚至可能發生肢體衝突 (to provoke or taunt someone into fighting, to cause trouble; literally: to stir up a fight)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你係咪想撩交打啊？我唔驚你架噃。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai6 mai6 soeng2 liu4 gaau1 daa2 aa3? ngo5 m4 geng1 nei5 gaa3 bo3.
examples.translation: Are you trying to pick a fight? I'm not afraid of you.

senses.definition: 做嘢態度馬虎、草率、魯莽；亦指人衣着隨便、不修邊幅 ((of attitude) rough, careless, rash; (of dressing) too casual or untidy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 乜你寫封信都撈哨成噉㗎？
examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 se2 fung1 seon3 dou1 laau4 saau4 sing4 gam2 gaa3?
examples.translation: It's just a simple letter. How come your writing is so sloppy?

senses.definition: （某樣物件）大致上嘅形狀同埋佢啲組成部份嘅相對位置。 (face contour.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai1 fong1 jan4 ge3 leon4 kwok3 hou2 fan1 ming4.
examples.translation: The face contours of westerners are very pronounced.

senses.definition: （某啲作品）初步嘅形狀。 (outline; sketch.)

examples.text: 呢張設計圖淨係畫咗個輪廓出嚟，重未搞掂。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zoeng1 cit3 gai3 tou4 zing6 hai6 waak6 zo2 go3 leon4 kwok3 ceot1 lai4, zung6 mei6 gaau2 dim6.
examples.translation: This blueprint only depicts an outline. It isn't complete yet.

senses.definition: #流浪#寵物 嘅委婉語，通常指#流浪狗 或者#流浪貓 (stray animal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: I hope every stray dog finds a home.

senses.definition: 男人喺公眾地方向其他人露出自己嘅性器官 ((of a man) to expose one's genitalia in public; to flash one's genitalia)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公園有個變態佬對住啲少女露械。
examples.jyutping: gung1 jyun2 jau5 go3 bin3 taai3 lou2 deoi3 zyu6 di1 siu3 neoi5 lou6 haai6.
examples.translation: There's a man exposing himself to young girls at the park.

senses.definition: 拎走一個人嘅生命；即係殺死一個人 (to take sby's life; to drive sby to death)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我開一槍就可以攞你命嘞！
examples.translation: I can take your life with one shot!

senses.definition: 指一個人逝世，而死得唔光彩、甚至係餓死街頭；有説源自日軍侵華時期，廣州餓死街頭嘅人好多，骨瘦如柴嘅屍體被人用板車運走火化，就好似真係用車拉柴枝去燒咁 (to die, dead in a disgraceful way; believably come from WWII , when Japanese troops invaded Canton, many people starved to death, the bony bodies were collected on trolley and take to burn, looks like the trolley was carrying real firewood; literally: to pull firewood)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: He's already dead.

senses.definition: 加喺「#冇」以外嘅單音節動詞後面，表示對受事者嘅否定，並且處於比較高漲嘅情緒狀態 (not (after monosyllabic verbs except #冇 mou5); used in a relatively heightened emotional state to negate the patient)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: lei5 lan2 dak1 keoi5
examples.translation: don't give a fuck

senses.definition: 表示處於比較高漲嘅情緒狀態，聚焦喺對動作嘅否定；冇主語嘅話，就代指「冇（任何）人」、「一個人都冇」，表示施事者從缺 (used in a relatively heightened emotional state to focus on the negation of the action and, when without subjects, to denote the absence of agents, as an equivalent of indefinite pronouns "nobody" and "no one" in English)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 lan2 hai6 duk6 zung1 man4 hai6 aa3!
examples.translation: He doesn't study Chinese!

senses.definition: 喺動詞後面加強語氣，而該動詞通常係單音節同及物；比後綴更加貼近動詞 (intensifier following verbs which are usually monosyllabic and transitive; should be placed closer to the verb than suffixes)

examples.jyutping: zou6 lan2 jyun4 sin1 gong2?
examples.translation: Why the fuck hadn't you pointed it out until we finished?

senses.definition: #陽具（量詞：條／碌） (penis; dick)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔起眼或社會地位低嘅人，通常指男人 (a person of low status, usually referring to males)

examples.jyutping: duk6 lan2
examples.translation: diffident introvert

senses.definition: 用手指抓緊 (to grab with fingers)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我摙住佢喉嚨，佢透都透唔到氣。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lin2 zyu6 keoi5 hau4 lung4, keoi5 tau2 dou1 tau2 m4 dou2 hei3.
examples.translation: I am grabbing his throat and he can barely breathe.

senses.definition: 競爭、比拼 (to compete, to contest against)

examples.jyutping: lin2 ce1
examples.translation: to contest with others in the car race

senses.definition: 將傷口以針線縫起 (to sew wounds up by stitches)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 醫生我個傷口聯咗幾多針呀？
examples.translation: Doctor, how many stitches did you put on my wound?

senses.definition: 企圖瞞住人嘅騙術、詭計呢啲蠱惑招數 (trick)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 lung4 liu1
examples.translation: to perform a trick

senses.definition: 有人講咗一啲唔合適場合嘅説話或者做咗啲唔符合場合嘅事之後為咗制止嗰個人繼續講落去嘅説話 (used to accuse someone of taking advantage of one's vulnerability; literally: to be sarcastic or give praise)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 人地啱啱先流產完，你走嚟問佢落仔好唔好？攞景定贈慶呀你而家？
examples.jyutping: jan4 dei6 ngaam1 ngaam1 sin1 lau4 caan2 jyun4, nei5 zau2 lai4 man6 keoi5 lok6 zai2 hou2 m4 hou2? lo2 ging2 ding6 zang6 hing3 aa3 nei5 ji4 gaa1?
examples.translation: She just had a miscarriage and you're asking her advice on abortion? That's not appropriate.

senses.definition: #材料；#物料；構成某樣嘢嘅成份 (material; ingredient)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: leng3 liu2
examples.translation: refined materials

senses.definition: 資訊；消息；線索 (news; information; hint)

examples.jyutping: lau4 liu2
examples.translation: false information

senses.definition: 泛指能力、技巧、質素、內涵 (ability; skills; quality; stuff; makings; potentiality)

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 teng1 keoi5 gong2, keoi5 mou5 liu2 gaa3!
examples.translation: Don't listen to him. He is just not qualified!

senses.definition: 年老嘅牛 (an old cow or bull)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢老牛咁嘅聲都可以出到唱片，真係豬乸會上樹！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 ngau4 gam2 ge3 seng1 dou1 ho2 ji5 ceot1 dou2 coeng3 pin2, zan1 hai6 zyu1 naa2 wui5 soeng5 syu6
examples.translation: It's hard to believe that someone who sounds like an old cow was able to release a record!

senses.definition: #撚 嘅諧音 ((infix) near homophone of and euphemism for  #撚 lan2)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.text: 碟餸好乸難食，賣相仲奇乸怪。
examples.jyutping: dip6 sung3 hou2 naa2 naan4 sik6, maai6 soeng3 zung6 kei4 naa2 gwaai3.
examples.translation: This dish is disgustingly unappetizing and looks quite strange.

senses.definition: 外國嚟嘅（人或物） (imported or came from foreign country)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.translation: imported goods

senses.definition: 一種放蕩或唔檢點外觀或感覺令人覺得嗰個人會參與賣淫 (a dissolute or unconventional look and feel that imply someone would work as a prostitute)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種買賣黃金嘅方法，冇統一嘅交易場所，投資者根據倫敦市場現貨黃金價格喺無形市場落盤，交易商再將買賣訂單推出市場俾人承接 (a spot gold trading contract, trade in over-the-counter market, literally "London gold". Taking reference of the London spot gold fix, dealers provide bid and ask quotes to clients based on the quotations of other counterparts.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種以投資「倫敦金」為名嘅騙局，經紀以高回報吸引受害人俾錢同埋授權投資，但由於金嘅買賣比較少監管，騙徒以各種手段瓜分受害人嘅本金，通常令受害人最後血本無歸 (usually refers to schemes which an agent claims to make investments in the gold exchange markets in London, but in fact intends to defraud the investor by taking advantage of the relatively unregulated gold market; often victims end up losing their entire investment)

examples.jyutping: maai6 leon4 deon1 gam1
examples.translation: to sell London gold; practically: to defraud investors

senses.definition: #南獅 三種典型舞獅造型；取材自三國時代劉備、關羽、張飛桃園三結義，獅頭獅身嘅顏色分別係黃色、紅色同黑色 (the three traditional lion outlooks, each in yellow, red and black)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 着少布嘅衫，露出皮膚 (to dress in revealing clothes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau6 ze3 di1 ji2 lou6 juk6 aa3!
examples.translation: He is intentionally showing more skin again by dressing lightly!

senses.definition: 路上面，喺舖路材料嘅上面 (surface of road; pavement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lou6 min2 sap1 waat6
examples.translation: the road is slippery

senses.definition: 同人非常親密，有好多身體接觸 (to be very close, to be intimate, to be very "lovey-dovey".)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 唔自量咁去表現自己欠缺嘅智慧 (to show off the intelligence that one actually doesn't have or to act like an expert with know-how; literally: to pretend to be smart)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔識就扮識，咪響度懶醒啦。
examples.jyutping: m4 sik1 zau6 baan6 sik1, mai6 hoeng2 dou6 laan2 sing2 laa1.
examples.translation: You pretend to know everything but actually you are not, please stop showing off the intelligence that you don't have.

senses.definition: 居無定所 (to live as a vagrant with no settled place of residence)

examples.jyutping: lau4 long6 maau1
examples.translation: stray cat

senses.definition: 周圍遊走 (to wander)

examples.jyutping: bat1 zo2 jip6 zi1 hau6 ngo5 zi6 gei2 jat1 go3 jan2 hai2 au1 zau1 lau4 long6 zo2 seng4 nin4.
examples.translation: After graduation, I wandered in Europe alone for a whole year.

senses.definition: 冇主人養，周圍#流浪 嘅#貓（量詞：隻） (feral cat; stray cat)

examples.text: 今日阿明去咗做義工幫手餵社區入面嗰啲流浪貓。
examples.translation: Today A-ming volunteered to feed feral cats in the neighbourhood.

senses.definition: 波長較短#可見光 嘅統稱，亦唔一定係藍色，並冇嚴格科學定義，通常用喺廣告 (blue light)

senses.definition: 令一樣嘢嘅温度降低，通常用喺機械之類嘅嘢 (to reduce temperature (of hot substances, especially machines))

examples.text: 用液態氦冷卻水銀會變成超導體。

examples.translation: When mercury is cooled by liquid helium, it enters a superconductive state.

#坐館 (triad leader)

senses.definition: 一種切割機器，特點係用旋轉嘅刀件去切一啲固定嘅嘢 (milling machine)

senses.definition: 即係#最後 (last)

senses.definition: 顏色；#三原色 之一；晴天天空嘅顏色 (blue (colour))

examples.text: 根據統計，藍色原來係最多女仔鍾意嘅顏色。
examples.jyutping: gan1 geoi3 tung2 gai3, laam4 sik1 jyun4 loi4 hai6 zeoi3 do1 neoi5 zai2 zung1 ji3 ge3 ngaan4 sik1.
examples.translation: According to statistics, blue is the favourite colour among females.

senses.definition: 極之#懶，仲誇張過蛇（見#大懶蛇） (bone idle; literally: lazier than a snake)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢咁多年嚟都係懶過條蛇，做嘢都唔識，仲扮到自己係個好好先生噉。

examples.translation: He's been work-shy over the years. He can do nothing, but he disguises himself as a gentleman.

senses.definition: 達到；創下某種紀錄；#記錄 咗 (to be recorded)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 十大屋苑今個星期只係錄得十宗成交。
examples.jyutping: sap6 daai6 uk1 jyun2 gam1 go3 sing1 kei4 zi2 hai6 luk6 dak1 sap6 zung1 sing4 gaau1.
examples.translation: Only ten secondary market transactions at 10 blue-chip housing estates were recorded this week.

examples.jyutping: nei5 teng1 waa6 di1 mai5 m4 sai2 ngo5 lo1 hei3 lo1.

examples.jyutping: lau4 sau2 ji4 tung4

examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 hoi1 zo2 gaan1 cong2 lin6 gam1.
examples.translation: A-chung set up a factory that smelt gold.

senses.definition: 極力推介、推薦 (to highly recommend)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 lik6 zin3 nei5 soeng5 wai2 wo3!
examples.translation: Boss highly recommended you for promotion.

senses.definition: 唔受節制；冇經過思量 (casually; randomly; without control or consideration)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jam2 zeoi3 zau2 zau6 wui5 lyun2 gam3 coeng3 go1.
examples.translation: When she gets drunk, she sings casually.

senses.definition: #律師 嘅辦公室，亦係客人簽署法律文件嘅地方（量詞：間） (law firm)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋全部都會喺今年暑假畀學校派去知名律師行實習。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 cyun4 bou6 dou1 wui5 hai2 gam1 nin2 syu2 gaa3 bei2 hok6 haau6 paai3 heoi3 zi1 ming4 leot6 si1 hong2 sat6 zaap6.
examples.translation: All of them will be sent by the university to famous law firms for internship this summer.

senses.definition: 一個人自己做或講一件事而自己要承受壞嘅結果；同「抵死」,「自食其果」 (a person said or did something and gets a punishment on his/her own.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 都叫你唔好飲噤多紅蘿蔔汁㗎啦！你而家成塊面都變咗橙色。你係唔係攞嚟衰吖！
examples.jyutping: dou1 giu3 nei5 m4 hou2 jam2 gam3 do1 hung4 lo4 baak6 zap1 gaa3 laa1! nei5 ji4 gaa1 sing4 faai3 min6 dou1 bin3 zo2 caang2 sik1. nei5 hai6 m4 hai6 lo2 lei4 seoi1 aa1!
examples.translation: I told you not to drink too much carrot juice! Your face changes to orange colour now. This is your own fault!

senses.definition: 運動術語，擊球前或出拳腳前，將手或者腳向後拉，用嚟增加力量同速度 ((sport) to pull back the arm or leg before making a strike, in order to increase the force and speed. Literally: pull bow)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 明仔喺四十幾碼外拉弓抽射，粒波直飛死角，個籠一啲反應都冇。
examples.jyutping: ming4 zai2 hai2 sei3 sap6 gei2 maa5 ngoi6 laai1 gung1 cau1 se6, nap1 bo1 zik6 fei1 sei2 gok3, go3 lung2 jat1 di1 faan2 jing3 dou1 mou5.
examples.translation: Ming pull his leg and shoot from over 40 yards away, the ball flied all the way to the corner of the goal, the goalkeeper cannot react to this sudden strike.

senses.definition: 盛大而莊重、鄭重嘅，通常用嚟形容典禮、儀式 ((usually of ceremonies) grand; solemn)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: lung4 zung6 kei4 si6
examples.translation: to attach so great importance to something; to celebrate lavishly out of respect

senses.definition: 有若干共同特徵嘅一組（量詞：個） (type)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每個類型都有一個型號代表。
examples.jyutping: mui5 go3 leoi6 jing4 dou1 jau5 jat1 go3 jing4 hou6 doi6 biu2.
examples.translation: Each type all has a model to represent.

senses.definition: 大專院校平均成績比較低嘅科目 ((in tertiary institutions) used to describe a subject which usually has bad grades)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: teng1 gong2 ni1 fo1 laan6 gwei1 gaa3 wo3.
examples.translation: I heard that people taking this subject usually have bad grades.

senses.definition: 加喺動詞後，表示持續進行某個行為一段時間；用嚟帶出對某樣嘢嘅評價 (added after a verb to express a re-assessment after doing or experiencing something for a certain period of time)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: tai2 lok6 ngo5 gok3 dak1 dou1 m4 co3 wo3.
examples.translation: After looking at it for a while, I think it is actually quite good.

senses.definition: #好 (good; beneficial; fine; moral)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: loeng4 hou2
examples.translation: good

senses.definition: 多、#非常 (great; very)

examples.text: Jasmin 思考良久，終於點點頭。
examples.jyutping: JASMIN si1 haau2 loeng4 gau2, zung1 jyu1 dim2 dim2 tau4.
examples.translation: Jasmin thought deeply for a long time and finally nodded her head.

senses.definition: 用喺句子最尾，表示同而家有關嘅變化或者新狀況；對應粵語嘅「#喇」(laa3) (added at the end of a sentence to indicate change or new situation; equivalent to Cantonese #喇 laa3)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: zau6 tin1 hak1 laa3.
examples.translation: It (the sky) is getting dark.

senses.definition: 表示喺某種條件之下會出現嘅狀況，好多時同「就」一齊用；對應粵語嘅「#喇」(laa3) 或者「#嘞」(laak3) (then; usually used with pre-verbal #就 zau6, to indicate the consequence under certain conditions; equivalent to Cantonese #喇 (laa3) or #嘞 (laak3))

examples.jyutping: lok6 jyu5 ngo5 zau6 m4 ceot1 gaai1 laa3.
examples.translation: If it rains, then I am not going anywhere.

senses.definition: 表示#催促、#勸説；對應粵語嘅「#喇」(laa3) 或者「#啦」(laa1) (used in urge or persuasion; equivalent to Cantonese #喇 (laa3) or #啦 (laa1))

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zoi3 daa2 laa3!
examples.translation: Please don't fight anymore!

senses.definition: 汽車#波箱#壞 咗 (the gearbox of a car to fail, to be malfunction)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有人話歐洲車啲波箱好易冧。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jan4 waa6 au1 zau1 ce1 di1 bo1 soeng1 hou2 ji6 lam3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Some people say that the gearboxes of European cars are very fragile.

senses.definition: 從冇任何突破去到首次得到突出嘅成績 (From no results to outstanding result for the first time)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今屆奧運會未過一半，港隊嘅成績就已破紀錄，除咗係泳隊零的突破，重係香港歷史上首次喺同一屆奧運贏得多過一面獎牌，真係可喜可賀。
examples.jyutping: gam1 gaai3 ou3 wan6 wui2 mei6 gwo3 jat1 bun3, gong2 deoi2 ge3 sing4 zik1 zau6 ji5 po3 gei2 luk6, ceoi4 zo2 hai6 wing6 deoi2 ling4 dik1 dat6 po3, zung6 hai6 hoeng1 gong2 lik6 si2 soeng6 sau2 ci3 hai2 tung4 jat1 gaai3 ou3 wan6 jeng4 dak1 do1 gwo3 jat1 min6 zoeng2 paai4, zan1 hai6 ho2 hei2 ho2 ho6.
examples.translation: This is not only a breakthrough for the Hong Kong team, but also the first time in Hong Kong's history that more than one medal has been won at the same Games, which is really something to celebrate.

senses.definition: 基督教嘅入教儀式，寓意洗清原有嘅罪惡 (to be baptized)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 黃太決定咗喺聖誕節領洗，正式加入教會。
examples.jyutping: wong4 taai2 kyut3 ding6 zo2 hai2 sing3 daan3 zit3 ling5 sai2, zing3 sik1 gaa1 jap6 gaau3 wui2.
examples.translation: Mrs. Wong has decided to get baptized at Christmas and officially join the church.

senses.definition: （人）辛勞、忙碌 ((of people)busy and tiring; to toil)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我唔返工會覺得好無聊，真係勞碌命！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 faan1 gung1 wui5 gok3 dak1 hou2 mou4 liu4, zan1 hai6 lou4 luk1 meng6!
examples.translation: I would feel bored when I am not working. I was born to toil!

senses.definition: 上斜時被地心吸力拉到褪後 (to roll back while going uphill due to gravity)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 上斜泊車要向右扭軚，就算溜後都只會撞路壆。
examples.jyutping: soeng5 ce3 paak3 ce1 jiu3 hoeng3 jau6 nau2 taai5, zau6 syun3 lau4 hau6 dou1 zi2 wui5 zong6 lou6 bok3.
examples.translation: When parking facing uphill, turn the steering wheel to the right. Even if your car rolls back, it will only hit the curb.

senses.definition: 忽視；唔夠體貼或者熱情 (to treat coldly; to cold-shoulder)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你成日都出差，小心冷落咗新婚太太啊！
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 dou1 ceot1 caai1, siu2 sam1 laang5 lok6 zo2 san1 fan1 taai3 taai2 aa3!
examples.translation: You are always on business trips, be careful not to ignore your newly wedded wife.

senses.definition: 爛到連殘餘嘅部份都唔多完整 (ragged; worn away to nothing; completely smashed; beyond repair)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢抌條褲入洗衣機洗，褲袋張紙梗係洗到爛溶溶啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dam2 tiu4 fu3 jap6 sai2 ji1 gei1 sai2, fu3 doi2 zoeng1 zi2 gang2 hai6 sai2 dou3 laan6 jung4 jung4 laa1!
examples.translation: He put the trousers into the washing machine to wash. The paper in the pockets was certainly worn away to nothing.

senses.definition: 同某物有共同之處，但並非完全一樣 (similar; analogous)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 劫匪拎住類似手槍嘅物體行劫。
examples.jyutping: gip3 fei2 ling1 zyu6 leoi6 ci5 sau2 coeng1 ge3 mat6 tai2 hang4 gip3.
examples.translation: The robber held something that appeared to be a pistol in the robbery.

senses.definition: 形容人坐或者瞓嘅姿勢唔直，背脊#攣 咗 ((of gestures) not straight; (of people's back) curved)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔好坐到攣弓蝦米咁，第時你會腰骨痛。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 co5 dou3 lyun1 gung1 haa1 mai5 gam2, dai6 si4 nei5 wui5 jiu1 gwat1 tung3.
examples.translation: Don't bend your waist while sitting. Your waist will hurt when you get old.

senses.definition: 形容物件形態彎彎曲曲 ((of objects) not straight; curved)

examples.text: 啲字寫到攣弓蝦米咁，點睇啊？
examples.jyutping: di1 zi6 se2 dou3 lyun1 gung1 haa1 mai5 gam2, dim2 tai2 aa1?
examples.translation: The handwriting is too messy. How do I read?

senses.definition: 因為家庭生活唔開心而自己離開屋企，唔再同屋企人一齊生活 (to run away from home; to leave home because one feels constrained or unhappy at home)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 因為父母反對佢拍拖，所以佢決定離家出走。
examples.jyutping: jan1 wai6 fu6 mou5 faan2 deoi3 keoi5 paak3 to1, so2 ji5 keoi5 kyut3 ding6 lei4 gaa1 ceot1 zau2.
examples.translation: Because her parents were against her date/love affair, she decided to leave her home.

senses.definition: #海浪#濺 起嘅#水花 (sea spray; breaking wave)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 假日我鍾意去海邊欣賞海浪拍打岩石嗰時濺起嘅浪花。
examples.jyutping: gaa3 jat6 ngo5 zung1 ji3 heoi3 hoi2 bin1 jan1 soeng2 hoi2 long6 paak3 daa2 ngaam4 sek6 go2 si4 cin2 hei2 ge3 long6 faa1.
examples.translation: On holidays I like travelling to the seaside to watch waves splashing on rocks.

senses.definition: 負責#領港 嘅職員；行內又俗稱#帶水（量詞：個） ((of pilotage) (sea) pilot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港大約有100個持有執照嘅領港員，每月領航大約4500航次。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 daai6 joek3 jau5 jat1 baak3 go3 ci4 jau5 zap1 ziu3 ge3 ling5 gong2 jyun4, mui5 jyut6 ling5 hong4 daai6 joek3 sei3 cin1 ng5 baak3 hong4 ci3.
examples.translation: There are about 100 licensed pilots in Hong Kong to handle about 4500 ship movements per month.

senses.definition: 點心；係餡料用#蓮子、#豬油、#糖 製成嘅#蒸包（量詞：個／籠） (lotus seed bun)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lin4 jung4 baau1 sat6 zoi6 taai3 tim4 laak3.
examples.translation: Lotus seed buns are too sweet for my taste.

senses.definition: 標示主題、方面、角度或者方式 (in terms of; in relation to; regarding; in a ... sense; (adverb) speaking; used to denote the theme, aspect, perspective or manner)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: gaan2 daan1 lai4 gong2
examples.translation: simply speaking

senses.definition: #領悟、#理解 (to grasp or master, esp. the essence of a concept or teaching)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 首詩嘅精粹要慢慢去領會。
examples.jyutping: sau2 si1 ge3 zing1 seoi5 jiu3 maan6 maan2 heoi3 ling5 wui2.
examples.translation: It takes time for one to understand and appreciate the essence of the poem.

senses.definition: 每個禮拜嘅第五日；#禮拜三 之後嗰日（量詞：個） (Thursday)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lai5 baai3 sei3 ngo5 m4 dak1 haan4 aa3.
examples.translation: Oh I'm not free on Thursday.

senses.definition: 公共交通工具放低#乘客；俾乘客#落車 ((of public transport) to drop off passengers; to allow passengers to get off)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢度淨係准的士落客，冇車搭㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 zing6 hai6 zeon2 dik1 si2 lok6 haak3, mou5 ce1 daap3 gaa3.
examples.translation: This is a taxi drop-off point. You can't get a taxi here.

senses.definition: 一種生果，細細粒、圓碌碌，個殼係淺啡色，上邊有淺淺地類似龜殼咁嘅紋路，啲肉係透明或者乳白色。（量詞：隻／粒） (longan)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lung4 ngaan5 gon1
examples.translation: dried longans

senses.definition: 出於禮貌，放棄一啲野、讓俾其他人 (to give precedence to somebody out of courtesy; to be courteous in manners)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 司機如果可以互相禮讓，就會少啲交通意外。
examples.jyutping: si1 gei1 jyu4 gwo2 ho2 ji5 wu6 soeng1 lai5 joeng6, zau6 wui5 siu2 di1 gaau1 tung1 ji3 ngoi6.
examples.translation: If car drivers could mutually be courteous in manners, there would be fewer traffic accidents.

senses.definition: 以氣勢連續地做幾件事 (to do a series of things continuously with morale)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 證監會對於呢間公司嘅制裁將會連珠炮發。
examples.jyutping: zing3 gaam1 wui5 deoi3 jyu1 ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 ge3 zai3 coi4 zoeng1 wui6 lin4 zyu1 paau3 faat3.
examples.translation: The securities committee will continuously sanction this company.

senses.definition: 不斷發表言論，通常攻擊其他人或佢哋嘅觀點 (to express one's opinion continuously, usually in order to attack someone/sth verbally)

examples.text: 佢喺經濟問題上面連珠炮發，批評主流媒體忽視科技發展對經濟嘅重要性。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ging1 zai3 man6 tai4 soeng6 min6 lin4 zyu1 paau3 faat3, pai1 ping4 zyu2 lau4 mui4 tai2 fat1 si6 fo1 gei6 faat3 zin2 deoi3 ging1 zai3 ge3 zung6 jiu3 sing3.
examples.translation: He expresses his opinion on economic problems continuously, criticizing that mainstream media disregards the role played by technological development.

senses.definition: 中國水墨畫嘅一種技法，刻意喺畫紙保留空白位置，保留觀賞者嘅想象空間；亦引申指其他藝術作品入面一啲冇講到明晒嘅位。 (to leave a blank space (as a technique) in an artistic work)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢套電影有好多留白嘅位比我哋去慢慢詮釋。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 din6 jing2 jau5 hou2 do1 lau4 baak6 ge3 wai2 bei2 ngo5 dei6 heoi3 maan6 maan2 cyun4 sik1.
examples.translation: There are many implicit messages in this film for us to illustrate.

senses.definition: #阿婆（媽媽嘅媽媽），同#孫仔／#孫女 兩個人 (the maternal grandmother, and grandson/granddaughter, two people)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩婆孫好似糖黐豆咁，打風都打唔甩。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 po4 syun1 hou2 ci5 tong4 ci1 dau2 gam2, daa2 fung1 dou1 daa2 m4 lat1.
examples.translation: They, the (maternal) grandma and grandson, are like bean stuck with sugar. They are never separated.

senses.definition: 迅速噉用手收集 (to gather quickly; to grab)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: laap3 gaa3 caang1
examples.translation: to pick up tools or instruments, including firearms, particularly those used by workers or criminals

senses.definition: 好多次；一次又一次 (repeatedly; for many times)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你屢次頂撞上司，睇怕嚟緊都冇運行。
examples.jyutping: nei5 leoi5 ci3 ding2 zong6 soeng6 si1, tai2 paa3 lai4 gan2 dou1 mou5 wan6 haang4.
examples.translation: You have argued with your boss for so many times, so I am afraid there would be no luck for you in the near future.

senses.definition: 一種生果；球狀；果皮厚，呈綠色或黃色，可以食用；果肉偏白，甜中帶少少苦，而且有核（量詞：個/隻） (pomelo; shaddock)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: luk1 jau2 pei4
examples.translation: pomelo skin

senses.definition: 平常習慣；一如以往 (ordinary; same old way; as usual)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢例牌遲到㗎喇，唔使等佢喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lai6 paai2 ci4 dou3 gaa3 laa3, m4 sai2 dang2 keoi5 laa3.
examples.translation: He's late as usual, there is no need to wait for him.

senses.definition: 嘢飲；由#黑加侖子 汁同糖水溝成，分為可以即刻飲嘅樽裝同埋要溝水開稀嘅糖漿；據講有好豐富嘅維他命C；茶餐廳通常有得賣（量詞：枝／杯） (Ribena)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我想要一杯檸檬利賓納。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 jiu3 jat1 bui1 ning4 mung1 lei6 ban1 naap6.
examples.translation: I would like a cup of Ribena with lemon.

senses.definition: 眼、喉等器官受外物刺激或發炎所感到嘅痛楚或唔舒服 ((of an object in one's eye or throat) irritating, inflammatory)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngaan5 jap6 zo2 nap1 saa1, hou2 lak1.
examples.translation: A grain of sand got in my eye, it's very irritating.

senses.definition: 香港政府出售居屋時，公屋住户市民或合資格人士用嚟申請嘅表格（量詞：張／份） (Green Form in Home Ownership Scheme of Hong Kong, for public rental housing residents to purchase flats sold under Home Ownership Scheme)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: luk6 biu2 jan4 si6
examples.translation: Green form applicants

senses.definition: 暗示某個人#賣淫 (to imply a person who engages in sexual intercourse in exchange for pay)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 lai4 lou1
examples.translation: to go out and work as a prostitute

senses.definition: 幫襯完唔俾錢；借咗錢特登唔還 (to repudiate a charge or debt)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你食咗嘢唔俾錢，想賴帳呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 sik6 zo2 je5 m4 bei2 cin2, soeng2 laai6 zoeng3 aa4?
examples.translation: You've finished the meal and don't pay the bill, don't you want to repudiate the debt?

senses.definition: 講嘢唔算數；#食言 (to go back on one's word)

examples.text: 你應承咗我又唔做，你想賴帳呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 jing1 sing4 zo2 ngo5 jau6 m4 zou6, nei5 soeng2 laai6 zoeng3 aa4?
examples.translation: You've promised me but you don't take any action, don't you want to go back on your word?

senses.definition: #利益#申報 嘅縮寫，常見於網上 (declaration of interests; disclaimer)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 利申先，我唔係黨員亦無投過票俾嗰個黨，但係我今次撐佢哋。
examples.jyutping: lei6 san1 sin1, ngo5 m4 hai6 dong2 jyun4 jik6 mou5 tau4 gwo3 piu3 bei2 go2 go3 dong2, daan6 hai6 ngo5 gam1 ci3 caang3 keoi5 dei6.
examples.translation: Disclaimer: I am not a member of the party nor have I voted for them before, but this time, I support them.

senses.definition: #引致；#導致；#造成；#驅使（注意：後面唔可以加任何動詞後綴） (to make; to cause (note: this verb cannot be followed by any verbal suffix))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ling6 jan4 gu2 mou5
examples.translation: heartening and encouraging

senses.definition: 喺側邊用嚟保護同裝飾嘅裝置，通常起喺建築物或者設施邊緣、橋樑兩邊、行人路同馬路之間（量詞：條／枝） (fence; railing; banister; crisscross)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 欄杆上面啲油漆仲未乾。
examples.jyutping: laan4 gon1 soeng6 min6 di1 jau4 cat1 zung6 mei5 gon1.
examples.translation: The paint on the fences is still wet (not dry).

senses.definition: 講低要對方知道嘅訊息 (to leave a message or comment)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 知道答案就去呢個post留言，答啱咗就有禮物㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: zi1 dou3 daap3 on3 zau6 heoi3 ni1 go3 pos1 lau4 jin4, daap3 ngaam1 zo2 zau6 jau5 lai5 mat6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: If you know the answer, leave a comment in this post. If you are correct, you'll receive a prize.

senses.definition: 會議因為與會人數不足而無法進行 ((of meetings) to be adjourned or to fail to be convened for a lack of quorum)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次流咗會，下個星期復會。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 lau4 zo2 wui2, haa6 go3 lai5 baai3 fuk6 wui2.
examples.translation: In a lack of quorum the meeting had to be adjourned and will be resumed next week.

senses.definition: 喺餐廳嗌嘢食嗰陣，講明要#外賣 (takeaway)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: jiu3 go3 ei1 caan1, lik1 zau2.
examples.translation: Set A for takeaway.

senses.definition: 令人快樂嘅事 (pleasant experience)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jan4 sang1 jat1 daai6 lok6 si6
examples.translation: a pleasant experience in life

senses.definition: 財務上嘅#百分點 ((finance) percentage point)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: ngan4 hong4 gaam2 sik1 bun3 lei4
examples.translation: to cut the bank interest rate by half a percentage point

senses.definition: 用喺前面，表示百分之一 (centi-)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: lei4 mai5
examples.translation: centimetre

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Lun")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺某機構返工或返學嘅最後一日 (last day of work or study in a certain institution)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你仲記唔記得last day嗰晚我哋喺學校打邊爐啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zung6 gei3 m4 gei3 dak1 laas1 dei1 go2 maan5 ngo5 dei6 hai2 hok6 haau6 daa2 bin1 lou4 aa3?
examples.translation: Do you still remember that we had hotpot at school on the night of our last school day (before graduation)?

senses.definition: 中式#戲曲 行業嘅別稱 (the world of any variety of Chinese opera; literally: Pear Garden)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lei4 jyun4 zi2 dai6
examples.translation: Children of the Pear Garden" (artists of any variety of Chinese opera)

senses.definition: 去#酒吧 (to go to a bar)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我第一次落吧有咩要注意？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dai6 jat1 ci3 lok6 baa1 jau5 me1 jiu3 zyu3 ji3?
examples.translation: What should I pay attention to when going to a bar for the first time?

senses.definition: 除此之外；用第二個途徑 (besides; also; as well; separately)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ling6 ngoi6 maai5 do1 jat1 zi1 bat1
examples.translation: to buy one more pen as well

senses.definition: 無論點都 (absolutely, no matter what; (literally: old vagina also))
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢叫我食曬佢， 咁我梗係老閪都唔食啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 giu3 ngo5 sik6 saai3 keoi5, gam2 ngo5 gang2 hai6 lou5 hai1 dou1 m4 sik6 laa1!
examples.translation: He told me to eat it all, I said absofuckinglutely not!

senses.definition: #瀨粉 簡稱 (short form of lai-fun)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: siu1 ngo2 laai6
examples.translation: roost goose lai-fun

senses.definition: 輪姦嘅委婉詞 (to gang-bang)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zeoi3 waa1 caam2 bei6 luk6 naam4 leon4 mai5.
examples.translation: A drunken damsel was gang-banged by six men.

senses.definition: 用嚟覆述自己或者人哋講過嘅嘢，唔耐煩嗰時用 (I said; it was said that; you (the hearer) should have already understood; used at the end of an utterance when repeating an earlier quote; also suggests that the speaker is impatient)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: dou1 waa6 m4 jiu3 lok3.
examples.translation: I said I don't need it.

senses.definition: 用作反駁，通常同副詞「#夠」連用 (used to refute; usually with the adverb #夠 gau3)

examples.jyutping: zoeng2 bui1 zi1 maa3, ngo5 gau3 jau5 lok3.
examples.translation: Trophies? Oh, come on, I've got some too.

senses.definition: 放喺複句嘅上句入面，上接理由，下接後續嘅行動 (so, therefore)

examples.text: 我見個個都未走咯，我咪繼續做嘢囉。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin3 go3 go3 dou1 mei6 zau2 lok3, ngo5 mai6 gai3 zuk6 zou6 je5 lo1.
examples.translation: Everyone was still there, so I continued to work.

senses.definition: 編造一個牽強嘅藉口開脱一己過失或失敗；歸咎於無關痛癢嘅變數 (to make a far-fetched excuse for one's own fault or failure; to attribute an undesirable outcome to an unrelated or a remotely related variable; literally, to blame the hardness of ground on which one stands)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: o1 si2 m4 ceot1 laai6 dei6 ngaang6
examples.translation: an idiomatic and more vulgar expression that bears the same meaning as '賴地硬'; literally, to blame one's constipation on the hardness of ground on which one tried to defecate

senses.definition: 分開，通常代表唔會有再次見面嘅機會 (to leave; to part usually for a long period)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 同愛人離別嘅心情，實在難以形容。
examples.jyutping: tung4 oi3 jan4 lei4 bit6 ge3 sam1 cing4, sat6 zoi6 naan4 ji5 jing4 jung4.
examples.translation: The feeling of leaving someone that you love is difficult to describe.

senses.definition: 存在喺兩個無直接血緣關係嘅人之間嘅 #愛，同 #愛情 有小小分別，「戀」通常指 #結婚 之前嘅愛情階段，或者更加初步嘅愛情，着重喺浪漫，未必會對未來考慮太多（量詞：場／次） (to be in love; to have a romantic relationship)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋都戀愛咗差唔多 10 年喇，係時候結婚喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 dou1 lyun2 oi3 zo2 caa1 m4 do1 sap6 nin4 laa3, hai6 si4 hau6 git3 fan1 laa3.
examples.translation: They have been in a relationship for almost 10 years. It's time to get married.

senses.definition: 唔加選擇，亂咁識#朋友 (making friends without considering whether they are good or bad)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 輕易同人發生#性行為 (having easy, casual or promiscuous sex relationship)

examples.text: 佢自恃高大有型，周不時玩一夜情，仲成日換性伴侶，十分之濫交。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi6 ci5 gou1 daai6 jau5 jing4, zau1 bat1 si4 waan2 jat1 je6 cing4, zung6 seng4 jat6 wun6 sing3 bun6 leoi5, sap6 fan1 zi1 laam5 gaau1.
examples.translation: He uses his well-built body and good-looking face to his advantage to commit to casual sex relationships. He has one-night stand and swaps sex partners all the time.

senses.definition: 離開地面 (to be detached, lifted, separated from the surface of the ground; to be above ground)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 架車轉彎時後轆離咗地，好彩冇反！
examples.jyutping: gaa3 ce1 zyun3 waan1 si4 hau6 luk1 lei4 zo2 dei6, hou2 coi2 mou5 faan2!
examples.translation: The car's rear wheels lifted off the ground during the turn. Luckily the car did not flip over!

examples.translation: Being stuck behind double-deckers on one-way streets is just the worst.

senses.definition: 指人做事遲疑不決，到決定時已經太遲。源自古時科舉考試，由於考題複雜，往往寫一日一夜都未必能完成，才思唔夠嘅考生審題起草已經用咗一整日，要去到半夜打響三更先正式開始答卷。三更即係11:00-01:00午夜時份，睇埋#打更 (to delay, to hesitate, to be indecisive, to be unable to make up one's mind. The phrase originates from ancient imperial exams. Exam questions were so complex that the exam would take 24 hours to complete; slower candidates would need to think and draft for a whole day's time before starting to write on the official answer sheet around midnight. Literally: start writing at midnight)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嗰陣你諗咁耐都唔去買，依家想買結果又賣晒，真係「落筆打三更」，唔得當機立斷。
examples.jyutping: go2 zan6 nei5 nam2 gam3 noi6 dou1 m4 heoi3 maai5, ji4 gaa1 soeng2 maai5 git3 gwo2 jau6 maai6 saai3, zan1 hai6 lok6 bat1 daa2 saam1 gaang1, m4 dak1 dong1 gei1 laap6 dyun6.
examples.translation: You couldn't make up your mind about whether to buy it last time, and now it's sold out. You're so indecisive!

senses.definition: 現時常被當作「#落手打三更」使用，比喻開局不順、#出師不利、一開始就做錯。 (to do wrongly from the very start, to have a bad start)

examples.text: 呢隊波「落筆打三更」，開季第一輪已經連輸三場，睇嚟今季有排捱。
examples.jyutping: ni1 deoi2 bo1 lok6 bat1 daa2 saam1 gaang1, hoi1 gwai3 dai6 jat1 leon4 ji5 ging1 lin4 syu1 saam1 coeng4, tai2 lei4 gam1 gwai3 jau5 paai4 ngaai4.
examples.translation: The team had a bad start this year. They opened the season with a three-game losing streak; I think they're going to have a hard time for the rest of the season.

senses.definition: 指出有嘢可以印證自己嘅預料、判斷、觀察正確 (used when evidence is present to confirm the speaker's predictions, judgements or observations)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: go3 tou5 gu4 gu2 seng1 daa2 saai3 gu2 gam2, tou5 ngo6 le5?
examples.translation: Your stomach is growling. You must be hungry, right?

senses.definition: 加喺形容詞後面，用嚟認叻 (added after an adjective, used for bragging)

examples.text: 我今年考試科科攞Ａ，威哩？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 nin2 haau2 si5 fo1 fo1 lo2 ei1, wai1 le5?
examples.translation: I got straight A's in all subjects this year. It really was something, wasn't it?

senses.definition: 加喺同能力、成就有關嘅句子最尾，用嚟貶低聽嘅人 (added to sentences pertaining to one's ability or achievement, in order to belittle the listener)

examples.jyutping: gu2 m4 dou2 le5?
examples.translation: You didn't expect this, did you?

senses.definition: 堅持自己嘅睇法、決定 (used to affirm one's stance, belief or decision)

examples.text: 我外婆後生個陣不知幾靚。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ngoi6 po4 hau6 saang1 go2 si4 bat1 zi1 gei2 leng3.
examples.translation: My maternal grandmother was really beautiful when she was young.

senses.definition: #蓮 嘅種子（量詞:粒） (lotus seed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tong4 lin4 zi2
examples.translation: sugary lotus seed

senses.definition: 原本指武術、拳賽競技嘅地方；後尾泛指一切有挑戰、比試成份嘅活動（量詞：個） (ring for martial arts; arena (for all kinds of tournaments))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 leoi4 toi4
examples.translation: to fight in the ring; to take up the challenge

senses.definition: 通常由植物或者動物提取，室温呈固體、油脂狀、唔溶喺水、可塑性強嘅物質 (wax; polish)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 laap6
examples.translation: hair wax

senses.definition: 物件、建築嘅內部 (in; inside)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 落雨嘞，快啲返入裏面啦。
examples.jyutping: lok6 jyu5 laak3, faai3 di1 faan1 jap6 leoi5 min6 laa1.
examples.translation: It's raining. Go inside quickly!

senses.definition: 建築物延伸出行人路上面嘅部分，或者突出喺空中嘅部分，用矮牆或者欄杆圍住，嚴格嚟講下面冇柱頂住先叫露台（量詞：個） (balcony)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家啲樓，露台仲大過間房。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 di1 lau2, lou6 toi4 zung6 daai6 gwo3 gaan1 fong2.
examples.translation: Nowadays, a balcony can be larger than a room in a flat.

senses.definition: 自然現象；當雲層累積咗一定嘅厚度，就有機會放出強度非常大嘅#電，令天空出現強烈閃光同聲音，閃光叫做#閃電、聲音叫做雷 (thunder, the sound associated with lightning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haang4 leoi4
examples.translation: to thunder

senses.definition: 喺體温唔高嘅情況下出汗，原因可能係神經緊張、唔舒服或者突然受刺激 (cold sweat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: biu1 laang5 hon6
examples.translation: to break out in a cold sweat

senses.definition: 比較差嘅形勢 (inferior position or circumstance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家敵方處於劣勢，我哋應該乘勝追擊。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 dik6 fong1 cyu5 jyu1 lyut6 sai3, ngo5 dei6 jing1 goi1 sing4 sing3 zeoi1 gik1.
examples.translation: As the enemy is in an inferior position, we should take advantage of this situation to attack them.

senses.definition: 海軍嘅部隊；由唔同軍艦所組成（量詞：支） (fleet; armada)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai1 baan1 ngaa4 mou4 dik6 laam6 deoi2
examples.translation: Spanish Armada

senses.definition: 連著 (together with)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 聖誕節褦住新年，總共有十日假。
examples.jyutping: sing3 daan3 zit3 lang3 zyu6 san1 nin4, zung2 gung6 jau5 sap6 jat6 gaa3
examples.translation: Including Christmas and New Years, there are 10 days of vacation altogether.

senses.definition: 圓形嘅物件，尤其外圈 (wheel; disc; ring)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ci2 leon4
examples.translation: gear wheel

senses.definition: 親自去做一樣事 (to start working; to set about; literally: to put one's hands in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 sau2 lok6 goek3
examples.translation: to do something all by oneself

senses.definition: 比喻令人產生極端情緒嘅事物 (感覺難受、印象深刻、驚嚇、突兀等) (to describe something that arouses an extreme emotion (harsh, impressive, frightening, funny, etc.); literally: taking one's guts away)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢今日件衫認真攞膽，大紅大綠著到成個小丑咁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 jat6 gin6 saam1 jing6 zan1 lo2 daam2, daai6 hung4 daai6 luk6 zoek3 dou3 sing4 go3 siu2 cau2 gam2.
examples.translation: His clothes today are so funny; those gaudy colours make him look like a clown.

senses.definition: #邀請 或#慫恿 人一齊去做某件事 (to invite or encourage somebody to do something together)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 lau3 ngo5 heoi3 sik6 hon4 siu1.
examples.translation: They asked me to have Korean BBQ with them together.

senses.definition: 激嬲人；撩人；招惹 (to piss someone off; to make someone angry; to provoke someone)

examples.jyutping: lau3 daa2
examples.translation: asking for a fight; asking for trouble

senses.definition: 爺爺同孫仔或孫女 (the grandfather and grandson/granddaughter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩爺孫嘅感情真係好好。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 je4 syun1 ge3 gam2 cing4 zan1 hai6 hou2 hou2.
examples.translation: The grandfather and grandson have a close relationship.

senses.definition: 計算重複做同一件事嘅次數 (round)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: san1 jat1 leon4 mau6 jik6 taam4 pun3
examples.translation: a new round of trade talks

senses.definition: 社會中人同人相處時日積月累而成嘅禮節，唔同地方都有唔同表達禮貌嘅方法，但通常都係用嚟表達尊重或者敬意 (courtesy; politeness; good manners)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mou5 lai5 maau6
examples.translation: to be impolite

senses.definition: 用滾水將食物浸熟嘅煮食方式 (to boil food in water)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: luk6 coi3
examples.translation: to boil vegetables in water

senses.definition: 畀熱水灼傷 (to be hurt by boiling water)

examples.text: 佢今日煮飯俾滾水淥親呀。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 jat6 zyu2 faan6 bei2 gwan2 seoi2 luk6 can1 aa3.
examples.translation: She was hurt by the boiling water when she was making the dinner.

senses.definition: #靈敏，#巧妙 (dexterous; nimble)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: #咁上下 嘅招式、技巧 (a certain extent of skills or technique)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 咁刁鑽嘅問題都避得開，佢都有返兩道散手呀吓。
examples.jyutping: gam3 diu1 zyun3 ge3 man6 tai4 dou1 bei6 dak1 hoi1, keoi5 dou1 jau5 faan1 loeng5 dou6 saan2 sau2 aa6 haa2.
examples.translation: She managed to sidestep the tricky question. She seems somewhat skillful.

senses.definition: 表達兩個人嘅意思，依附喺一般名詞、人物代詞或者「#們」字後面，當中一般名詞以指涉兩個人嘅關係嘅名詞為主 ((of people) two; preceded by general nouns (mainly those describing the relationship between two people), personal pronouns or #們)
senses.label: 數詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 loeng5 go3
examples.translation: both of us; the two of us

senses.definition: 即係兩個；唔需要量詞 (two units; two items; two pieces (without classifier))

examples.jyutping: maai5 loeng5 go3 maan6 tau4
examples.translation: to buy two steamed buns

senses.definition: 物業嘅買賣合約，亦即係證明業主擁有座物業嘅法律文件（量詞：張） (deed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 記得帶埋張樓契去律師樓辦手續啊！
examples.jyutping: gei3 dak1 daai3 maai4 zoeng1 lau4 kai3 heoi3 leot6 si1 lau4 baan6 sau2 zuk6 aa3!
examples.translation: Remember to take the deed of the house to the law firm to complete the formalities.

senses.definition: 唔再隱藏或者俾嘢冚住 (to show; to reveal; to expose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kit3 lou6
examples.translation: to expose; to uncover

senses.definition: 由其他人手上得到或者獲取一啲嘢 (to receive; to get)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ling5 zoeng2
examples.translation: to receive an award

senses.definition: #預計 (to anticipate; to reckon; to foresee)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jyu6 liu6
examples.translation: to foresee

senses.definition: #照顧 (to take care of; to look after)

examples.jyutping: ziu3 liu6
examples.translation: to take care of; to attend to

senses.definition: 形容啲嘢食可以撐住個肚，食咗之後會有一段時間覺得飽，唔會好快餓嘅 (stomach-filling; used to describe foods that keep you full for a while)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 淨係食粥唔晾肚，我已經有啲餓喇。
examples.jyutping: zing6 hai6 sik6 zuk1 m4 long3 tou5, ngo5 ji5 ging1 jau5 di1 ngo6 laa3.
examples.translation: Eating congee only doesn't keep me full. I'm hungry already.

senses.definition: 人倫（人與人嘅相處關係）、道德。 (ethics; moral principles and values)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: leon4 lei5 siu2 syut3
examples.translation: morality fiction

senses.definition: 以鐵籠包圍住而畀一個人住嘅牀位；牀位寓所 (cage-house; cage home)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 《籠民》係香港一套以籠屋為題材嘅著名電影。
examples.jyutping: "lung4 man4" hai6 hoeng1 gong2 jat1 tou3 ji5 lung4 uk1 wai4 tai4 coi4 ge3 zyu3 ming4 din6 jing2.
examples.translation: Cageman" is a famous film in Hong Kong on a topic about cage homes.

senses.definition: 化學元素，原子序係88，符號係Ra，係一種嘅鹼土#金屬，所有#同位素 都會釋放#輻射 (radium)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 東亞重量量度單位；香港法定標準一両大約等於38#克；一#斤 等於十六両，一両等於十#錢；中國大陸嘅一#市両 就係50克 (tael; a unit measurement common in East Asia)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: ji6 loeng2
examples.translation: two taels

senses.definition: 「#二」嘅意思；喺量詞或者「#十」以外嘅位數詞前面出現，但係淨係數嘢嘅時候用（例如「兩個」、「兩千」），其餘時候用「二」（例如「一二三四五」、「第二」、「十二個」）。 (two; only used in front of measure words or larger base number words except #十 (sap6, ten); otherwise #二 ji6 should be used, e.g. 一二三四五 (jat1 ji6 saam1 sei3 ng5, one two three four five), 第二 (dai6 ji6, second), 十二個 (sap6 ji6 go3, twelve pieces of))
senses.label: 數詞

examples.jyutping: loeng5 gin6
examples.translation: two pieces

senses.definition: 概括表示細數目，唔多過#幾 (a small number; a meagre number; not more than #幾)

examples.jyutping: gong2 loeng5 geoi3 dak1 m4 dak1?
examples.translation: Can we talk for a bit? (Can we talk a sentence or two?)

senses.definition: 透過機械操作，將聲音記錄喺媒介度 (to record sounds)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: luk6 jam1 bat1
examples.translation: voice recorder pen

senses.definition: 尤其指喺#懷孕 早期，抑或喺#經期 前後嘅，帶#啡色 嘅#陰道#流血 (vaginal bleeding or spotting, usually of brownish colour, especially in the context of early pregnancy, or intermenstrual bleeding)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我大肚嗰陣由五週開始斷斷續續流啡流到九週，好驚陀唔住個B，好在之後就冇再流。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 daai6 tou5 go2 zan6 jau4 ng5 zau1 hoi1 ci2 tyun5 tyun5 zuk6 zuk6 lau4 fe1 lau4 dou3 gau2 zau1, hou2 geng1 to4 m4 zyu6 go3 bi1, hou2 zoi6 zi1 hau6 zau6 mou5 zoi3 lau4.
examples.translation: When I was pregnant, I had on-and-off vaginal spotting from 5 weeks till 9 weeks. I was so scared of a miscarriage. Luckily it stopped afterwards.

senses.definition: 咩都冇帶；上門作客或者探人無帶到禮物，將兩手空空嘅手指借喻為#蕉，所以叫兩梳蕉 (to visit someone without bringing a gift; to arrive empty-handed at someone's house. as the bananas represent the fingers of one's hands; literally: two bunches of bananas / bringing a bunch of bananas / bringing two bunches of bananas)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 兩梳蕉噉過去好似唔係幾好，不如帶枝酒啦。
examples.jyutping: loeng5 so1 ziu1 gam2 gwo3 heoi3 hou2 ci5 m4 hai6 gei2 hou2, bat1 jyu4 daai3 zi1 zau2 laa1.
examples.translation: It's not that nice to go there empty-handed. Let's take a bottle of wine.

senses.definition: 好#畀心機 整嘅作品 (a masterpiece, a piece of work (usually of a creative nature) that is the product of much efforts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今次呢隻新 #game 係任天堂嘅最新力作。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 nei1 zek3 san1 gem1 hai6 jam6 tin1 tong4 ge3 zeoi3 san1 lik6 zok3.
examples.translation: This new game is the latest masterpiece of Nintendo.

senses.definition: 喺任期內繼續喺某崗位，擔任某份職務 (to remain in office; to retain a post)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大家都希望佢唔好咁快退休，繼續留任。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 dou1 hei1 mong6 keoi5 m4 hou2 gam3 faai3 teoi3 jau1, gai3 zuk6 lau4 jam6.
examples.translation: We all hope that he won't retire so early, and that he will continue to remain in office.

senses.definition: 掹大隻眼，集中視力 (to open one's eyes wide)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 睩大隻眼睇清楚，上面寫明唔可以退款。
examples.jyutping: luk1 daai6 zek3 ngaan5 tai2 cing1 co2, soeng6 min6 se2 ming4 m4 ho2 ji5 teoi3 fun2.
examples.translation: Open your eyes! "No refund" is clearly written on it.

senses.definition: 倒；澆；灑（順住一定方向澆灑） (to pour (liquid into something))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: laai3 di1 jau4 lok6 wok6
examples.translation: to pour oil into the wok

senses.definition: 即刻；馬上；喺呢個時刻要做 (immediately; right now)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: laap6 zik1 dang1 gei3
examples.translation: register immediately

senses.definition: 緩慢 (slowly)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 連續唔間斷。 (repeatedly; again and again;)
喺餐廳嗌嘢食嗰陣，講明要#外賣 ((of food) takeaway; takeout; carry-out; to-go)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: jiu3 go3 ei1 caan1, ling1 zau2.
examples.translation: Set A for takeaway.

senses.definition: 將一件物件帶去其他地方，令佢離開原本嘅位置 (to take away)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢本書我睇完喇，你可以拎走喇。
examples.jyutping: nei1 bun2 syu1 ngo5 tai2 jyun4 laa3, nei5 ho2 ji5 ling1 zau2 laa3.
examples.translation: I have finished reading this book. You can take it away.

senses.definition: 一種植物，原產地係中國南部同泰國北部，果實常用於製藥、製茶，食落好甜 (Siraitia Grosvenorii, a kind of plant which is produced in southern China and northern Thailand. The fruit (monk fruit), often used to produce traditional medicine and tea, tastes sweet.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽講羅漢果水可以止咳。
examples.jyutping: teng1 gong2 lo4 hon3 gwo2 seoi2 ho2 ji5 zi2 kak1.
examples.translation: People say that monk fruit with water can stop coughing.

senses.definition: 有#刀鋒 嘅金屬工具，例如#刀、#鉸剪 之類（量詞：件／把） (utensil with sharp edge which can be used to cut something, usually made of metal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 屋企裏面嘅利器要小心收好，唔好俾細路仔攞到。
examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 leoi5 min6 ge3 lei6 hei3 jiu3 siu2 sam1 sau1 hou2, m4 hou2 bei2 sai3 lou6 zai2 lo2 dou2.
examples.translation: Sharp utensils have to be stored carefully and kept out of reach from children.

senses.definition: 離開自己做嘢嘅公司；可以係主動辭職、合約到期、俾人炒 (to leave one's post; can be used to refer to resignation, end of contract, or being made redundant)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 kyut3 ding6 lei4 zik1 ji4 man4 ngoi6 gwok3.
examples.translation: I've decided to resign and immigrate to a foreign country/abroad.

senses.definition: #經血（#M）喺唔適當嘅時候流出，尤其是整到被鋪、衫褲或者喺公眾場合發生嘅時候 (to leak menstrual blood unexpectedly, especially when staining clothing, linen, or happening in public places)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今日返工漏咗好大笪M，仲要男同事私底下同我講先知，好樣衰！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 jat6 faan1 gung1 lau6 zo2 hou2 daai6 daat3 em1, zung6 jiu3 naam4 tung4 si6 si1 dai2 haa6 tung4 ngo5 gong2 sin1 zi1, hou2 joeng2 seoi1!
examples.translation: My menstrual blood leaked accidentally at work today causing a huge stain, and I didn't even know until a male colleague told me in private. It was really embarrassing!

senses.definition: 利用口部靈活噉清走骨頭附近嘅肉，常用喺例如鳳爪、雞翼等等嘅食物 (to gnaw, nibble; to use the tongue and teeth to get the meat which is attached to the bones)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 噒乾淨隻雞翼先好食下一隻。
examples.jyutping: leon1 gon1 zeng6 zek3 gai1 jik6 sin1 hou2 sik6 haa6 jat1 zek3.
examples.translation: Eat your chicken wing thoroughly before you pick up another.

senses.definition: 熟悉內容並且吸收 (to absorb and familiarize with the contents)

examples.text: 噒熟份資料啦，面試有用㗎。
examples.jyutping: leon1 suk6 fan6 zi1 liu2 laa1, min6 si5 jau5 jung6 gaa3.
examples.translation: Revise this piece of information in details! It is good for your interview.

senses.definition: 緩慢噉爬行，多數形容細小嘅昆蟲 (to crawl; to creep)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zek3 ngai5 laan1 zo2 soeng5 nei5 zek3 sau2 dou6.
examples.translation: An ant has crawled on your hand.

senses.definition: 叫人走開、#死開、#滾蛋 嘅意思 (to tell someone to get lost, get out, go away)

examples.jyutping: laan1 hoi1
examples.translation: Go away !

senses.definition: 因為接觸化學品而有刺痛、燒灼嘅感覺 (painful because of the irritation of chemicals)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 支眼藥水好揦呀！係咪過咗期㗎？
examples.jyutping: zi1 ngaan5 joek6 seoi2 hou2 laa2 aa3! hai6 mai6 gwo3 zo2 kei4 gaa3?
examples.translation: These eyedrops burn my eyes! Are they expired?

senses.definition: 事物或行為令人感到滿意 (good; well; satisfactory)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: biu2 jin6 loeng4 hou2
examples.translation: good behaving

senses.definition: 就嚟到某個時候 ((of time) to be coming soon)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你話三年。三年之後又三年，三年之後又三年，十年都嚟緊頭啦老細！
examples.jyutping: nei5 waa6 saam1 nin4. saam1 nin4 zi1 hau6 jau6 saam1 nin4, saam1 nin4 zi1 hau6 jau6 saam1 nin4, sap6 nin4 dou1 lai4 gan2 tau4 laa1 lou5 sai3!
examples.translation: You said it was 3 years only, but then 3 more years, and then 3 more years again! It is going to be the 10th year already, Boss!

senses.definition: 組織中具有較大影響力嘅人，擁有話事權（量詞：個／位） (leader)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 zeoi3 gou1 ling5 dou6
examples.translation: The highest governor of China

senses.definition: 四圍#流浪，走遍各地 (to wander around the world)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 早兩日阿松孭住個背囊，話要去浪跡天涯，結果唔夠一個下晝就俾人抬返嚟。
examples.jyutping: zou2 loeng5 jat6 aa3 cung4 me1 zyu6 go3 bui3 nong4, waa6 jiu3 heoi3 long6 zik1 tin1 ngaai4, git3 gwo2 m4 gau3 jat1 go3 haa6 zau3 zau6 bei2 jan4 toi4 faan1 lai4.
examples.translation: A couple of days ago, A-chung took up a backpack, saying that he'd like to go travel around. Result? Not even an afternoon had passed when he got carried back.

senses.definition: 運動嗰時#阻力 最細嘅設計；一般指比較#圓滑，#弧線 或者#稜角 幅度細嘅設計 (streamlined shape)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 加喺姓氏前面或後面表示親切、熟悉或者尊敬。加咗「老」喺前面之後，姓氏最尾一個字如果係唔係第一聲，要讀第二聲。所以「周 zau1」繼續係「老周 lou5 zau1」，但係「黃 wong4」「麥 mak6」就會變「老黃 lou5 wong2」「老麥 lou5 mak2」。 (used to indicate affection, familarity or seniority before or after the surname of a person; after the prefix "老", if the last syllable of the surname is not Tone 1, it will become Tone 2. For example, "周 zau1" will become "老周 lou5 zau1" (i.e. no change), but "黃 wong4" and "麥 mak6" become "老黃 lou5 wong2" and "老麥 lou5 mak2" respectively.)

senses.definition: 用#涼粉草 製成嘅黑色#啫喱 狀食品，通常雪凍嚟食，同埋會切粒，配上#糖漿 甚至#生果 同#煉奶 成為甜品 (grass-jelly made of Chinese mesona, black in colour; usually cut into bite-size and served cold with syrup, and sometimes fruits and condensed milk as well, together as a dessert)

examples.translation: I asked him to go out with me on Saturday.

senses.definition: 每個#星期 嘅第六日；#禮拜四 之後嗰日（量詞：個） (Friday)

examples.text: 列支敦士登同烏孜別克斯坦係世界上僅存嘅兩個雙重內陸國，佢哋嘅鄰國都係內陸國家。

senses.definition: 放喺動詞短語之後，表示動作／事件啱啱過咗去 (used after a verb phrase to indicate that an action or event has just occurred)

examples.text: 你真係叻仔嚟，喺考試拎滿分。

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jung6 laa5 zaa2 sau2 dyun6 sin1 soeng5 dou2 ni1 go3 wai2.

jyutping: lou6 gin3 bat1 ping4 bat6 dou1 soeng1 zo6

lou gin bat ping bat dou soeng zo

senses.definition: 講完電話冇收到線，或者因為冇擺返正搞到冇收到線；以前啲電話個話筒係要扱落個電話座到先至可以中斷通話。如果將個電話筒晾起，其他人就會因為上一手冇收到線，而打唔到入嚟 (to hold a line by not place the phone back into its housing; this would prevent incoming calls because the line is accidentally held up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 傾完電話冇放返正，唔覺意晾咗線。
examples.translation: I forgot to put the phone back, and held the line by accident.

senses.definition: 一種化妝嘅形式；主要靠粉底或者遮瑕膏有技巧噉上妝，望落都係肉色色系，好似天然噉 (nude look)

examples.translation: This development project was aborted because of resistance from many parties.

senses.definition: 移動、傳播、遷徙 (to move or flow, to propagate, to migrate)

examples.translation: to have a running nose

senses.definition: 廣東人對華北中年女性嘅貶稱；由來睇#撈鬆 (derogatory address by Cantonese to female adults from Northern China; see #撈鬆 laau1 sung1 for the origin)

senses.definition: 一種自#棒球 發展出嚟，有類似玩法同規則嘅運動：投手掟個波出嚟，擊球手要用一枝棍打個波。打得中之後，攻方可以跑壘，而守方就要盡快搶番個波。守方搶到個波之後，就將佢掟去指定嘅壘位。如果攻方先掂到個壘就會得分，如果守方先接番個波，攻方就會出局。只要擊球手跑完一個圈，返到去本壘，就會有一分。 (softball)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 hou2 siu2 jan4 daa2 leoi4 kau4.
examples.translation: There are few people playing softball in Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 褲嘅一種，大髀同臀部好窄身，褲腳就好闊，成喇叭狀，因而得名（量詞：條） (flared pants; bell-bottoms)

senses.definition: 由幾條幼啲繩#繑 埋一齊，比較粗同大條嘅#繩；亦都指構造類似，但用嚟傳輸大量電力或者訊號嘅粗電#線 （量詞：條） (cable; hawser)

senses.label: 動詞
