examples.jyutping: lau2 gaa3 zoi3 dit3 jat1 sing4 ngo5 sin1 wui5 laau4 dai2.
examples.translation: I will buy only when house prices fall another 10 percent.

senses.definition: 上咗年紀嘅人；年紀老邁嘅人 (the aged; the elderly)

senses.definition: 遮蔽門窗嘅用具；用珠仔、布等製成（量詞：塊／堂） (curtain; usually made of materials like beads or cloth)

senses.definition: 對#藍絲 嘅蔑稱 (derogatory homophone for "#藍絲")

senses.definition: 一種百合科可食用植物，約一米高，有羽毛狀嘅葉 (asparagus)

examples.text: 因為走難，佢聯繫唔到屋企人。
examples.jyutping: jan1 wai6 zau2 naan6, keoi5 lyun4 hai6 m4 dou2 uk1 kei2 jan4.
examples.translation: He cannot get in touch with his family since they have fled from the war.

senses.definition: 將兩件事#連結 起嚟，例如因果關係 (to relate; to link; to connect)

examples.jyutping: lyun4 hai6 wui6 leot2
examples.translation: linked exchange rate system

senses.definition: 求其望下，而家專指「睇網頁」呢個動作 (to skim through; to browse (now used exclusively for websites))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lau4 laam5 mong5 jip6
examples.translation: to browse a website

senses.definition: 人與人之間嘅#聯絡、#接觸 (contact)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 因為有社交網站，媽咪同啲小學同學有返聯繫。
examples.jyutping: jan1 wai6 jau5 se5 gaau1 mong5 zaam6, maa1 mi4 tung4 di1 siu2 hok6 tung4 hok6 jau5 faan1 lyun4 hai6.
examples.translation: With social networking sites, Mum regains contact with her friends from primary school.

senses.definition: 喺就嚟成功、爭啲就完成嘅時候先犯錯、失敗 (a last minute failure in an enterprise which seemed headed for success, literally "to wet oneself before dawn")

examples.jyutping: daa2 tung4 lo4

senses.definition: 幫助將液體或者粉狀物體倒入一啲口細嘅容器嘅工具；大約係#錐 形，上面嘅開口大而下面細，液體喺個細嘅出口到出嚟，就唔會#濺 晒出去 (funnel)

examples.jyutping: waa3, leng3 dou3 dam2 jat1 seng1 aa3! hai6 keoi5 laa3!

senses.definition: 凍嘅季節；通常講#天冷 (cold season; usually #天冷 tin1 laang5)

senses.definition: 用一個標準去量化某物 (to measure)

examples.translation: We cannot measure one's success with money.

senses.definition: 食物；將白蘿蔔切絲，加入粉漿、冬菇、蝦米、臘腸、臘肉，然後拎去蒸成固體。食嘅時候可以煎（拎已經蒸到變固體嘅蘿蔔糕去煎）或者蒸。 (Chinese turnip cake)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 新年通常都會食唔同嘅糕，而蘿蔔糕可以話係最受歡迎嘅。
examples.jyutping: san1 nin4 tung1 soeng4 dou1 wui5 sik6 m4 tung4 ge3 gou1, ji4 lo4 baak6 gou1 ho2 ji5 waa6 hai6 zeoi3 sau6 fun1 jing4 ge3.
examples.translation: People eat different cakes in the new year. Chinese turnip cake is the most popular one.

senses.definition: 唔知醜、唔理其他人眼光去做自己想做嘅嘢 (shameless)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 冇#屋企 或者固定居所，要喺街度起居嘅人（量詞：個） (the homeless; a homeless person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個公園好多流浪漢出沒。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gung1 jyun2 hou2 do1 lau4 long6 hon3 ceot1 mut6.
examples.translation: Plenty of homeless people use this park as their home.

senses.definition: 喺卡牌遊戲、麻雀或賭局之中，上一鋪做完莊家之後，今鋪再繼續做多次。 (to be the banker in a game more than once in a row)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 接連贏出牌局或競爭。若用於競選之中，就係指連任。 (to win a game, competition or election in consecutive terms)

examples.text: 佢今年會唔會冧莊，又做主席呢？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 nin4 wui5 m4 wui5 lam6 zong1, jau6 zou6 zyu2 zik6 ne1?
examples.translation: Will he be the chairperson for another consecutive term this year?

senses.definition: 連續兩屆#上莊 (to run for office of a student organization in consecutive terms)
學校內負責維持紀律嘅學生（量詞：個） (prefect)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 領袖生喺學校係一個好重要嘅角色。
examples.jyutping: ling5 zau6 sang1 hai2 hok6 haau6 hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 zung6 jiu3 ge3 gok3 sik1.
examples.translation: Prefects play an important role in schools.

senses.definition: 泛指中學／小學入面有領導地位嘅學生，可以係領導學會嘅同學或者係學生會嘅幹事 (leaders of clubs and committee members of student union in secondary or primary schools)
墨水筆嘅#墨 唔受控制噉流出嚟 ((of pens) to leak ink)

examples.jyutping: lau6 mak6 lau6 dou3 seng4 go3 fu3 doi2 dou1 hai6.
examples.translation: (The pen) leaked ink and it's all over the pocket of my pants.

examples.jyutping: laap6 zoeng6 gun2

senses.definition: 實踐一個人嘅承諾；一個人做自己應該做嘅事，例如職責 (to perform or fulfill, usually one's duty or promise)

亂碰亂撞；周圍亂噉跑嚟跑去 (to do something pointless or in an aimless fashion, to have no fixed aim or intention for an action.)

#老朋友 (?) (associates; friends; literally: old friend)

#橄欖 嘅縮略 (olive; short form for #橄欖 gaam3 laam2)

examples.jyutping: laam2 wat6

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 lei4 wo1 hou2 dak1 ji3 aa3!
examples.translation: Her dimples are so cute!

senses.definition: 國家或者行政體#土地 同#領海 之上，可以喺嗰度行使主權嘅空域範圍；佢係屬於#領土 嘅一部份 (airspace)

examples.text: 呢間古董瓷器鋪真係琳瑯滿目，每一件都係珍品。

examples.text: 隆冬嘅時候一定要着番多啲衫。
examples.jyutping: lung4 dung1 ge3 si4 hau6 jat1 ding6 jiu3 zoek3 faan1 do1 di1 saam1.
examples.translation: We must wear enough clothes in midwinter.

senses.definition: 一種早期嘅香港公共房屋，租金廉宜。又分別指由香港屋宇建設委員會興建嘅廉租屋邨，同埋工務司署興建嘅政府廉租屋（而家已經全部清拆）；而廉租屋有時亦會泛指香港所有#公屋（量詞：間） (low-cost housing estate by the former Housing Authority; Government Low Cost Housing; or sometimes generally, all types of public housing in Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 舊梨木樹邨第七至十四座係入於政府廉租屋計畫嘅一部份。
examples.jyutping: gau6 lei4 muk6 syu6 cyun1 dai6 cat1 zi3 sap6 sei3 zo6 hai6 jap6 jyu1 zing3 fu2 lim4 zou1 uk1 gai3 waak6 ge3 jat1 bou6 fan6.

senses.definition: 因為各種意外#枉死，而化身成對#現世 有極強嘅怨念，會周圍去害人嘅惡#鬼（量詞：隻） (malicious ghost; malicious spirit)

examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 sing6 cyun4 jau5 hou2 do1 lai6 gwai2 ceot1 mut6.

senses.definition: 醒目；反應快、靈活；乾脆 (smart; quick-witted)

examples.translation: When it comes to appearance, I beat her by a mile.

senses.definition: 暫時唔做下一步、唔繼續，直至之後嘅時間，或者轉交另一個人 (to leave something until a later date; to wait until somebody attends to the issue)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: git3 guk6 lau4 doi6 haa6 wui4 fan1 gaai2.
examples.translation: (of TV or radio series) The ending is left to be disclose next time.

senses.definition: 同敵對嘅人一齊滅亡 ((usu. of enemies) to die together; to end up in common ruin)

senses.definition: 每個禮拜嘅第二日；#禮拜日 之後嗰日 (Monday)

senses.definition: 制度或者規則入面，考慮得唔夠詳盡或者清晰明確，畀人有機可乘嘅地方（量詞：個） (flaw; hole; loophole)

examples.text: 呢條法例有一個好大嘅漏洞。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 faat3 lai6 jau5 jat1 go3 hou2 daai6 ge3 lau6 dung6.
examples.translation: There is a large loophole in this law.

senses.definition: 每個禮拜嘅第四日；#禮拜二 之後嗰日（量詞：個） (Wednesday)

examples.jyutping: lai5 baai3 saam1 hai6 zeoi3 gui6 ge3 jat6 zi2.
examples.translation: Wednesday is the most tiring day of the week.

senses.definition: 一樣有動力嘅嘢係前面，帶動後面無動力嘅嘢向前行；相對地，喺後面嘅就叫#推動 (to pull)

senses.definition: 錄#影像 或者 #聲音 留底 (to record video or sound)

examples.translation: record what I say

senses.definition: 冇用或者冇人要嘅嘢，可以指無用嘅工具或者嫁唔出嘅女人 (someone or something unwanted left over, left behind; literally, orange / mandarin orange at the bottom of a basket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢隻牌子自從俾人踢爆用假料之後，佢啲產品就變晒做蘿底橙。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 paai4 zi2 zi6 cung4 bei2 jan4 tek3 baau3 jung6 gaa2 liu2 zi1 hau6, keoi5 di1 caan2 ban2 zau6 bin3 saai3 zou6 lo4 dai2 caang2.
examples.translation: After the scandal of using of fake materials was exposed, no one wants the products of this brand anymore.

senses.definition: 力量的大小 (the strength of force)

senses.definition: #旅行；經常以「之旅」嘅形式出現 (travel; trip; often in the form 之旅 zi1 leoi5)

examples.jyutping: siu1 haan4 zi1 leoi5
examples.translation: trip for relaxation

senses.definition: 好驚人咁準確預料到某樣嘢 (to foresee things miraculously)

senses.definition: 將腳放上另一個平面上面，例如檯或者凳 (to rest one's feet on top of a surface)

examples.jyutping: loe1 hau2 seoi2
examples.translation: to spit (saliva)

senses.definition: 壞人合流，一齊做壞事 (to be in cahoots; to collude)

examples.translation: You are welcome to pay a visit.

senses.definition: 成一條橫線嘅嘢。 (row)

examples.translation: inconnected

senses.definition: #輪流#當更 (to be on duty by turns; to work in shifts)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ji1 jyun2 zou6 wu6 si6, jiu3 leon4 gaang1.
examples.translation: She works in a hospital as a nurse. Shift work is required.

senses.definition: #連續 放嘅#假期（量詞：個／日／段） (continuous days off)

examples.text: 出年有幾多個紅日連假？
examples.jyutping: ceot1 nin2 jau5 gei2 do1 go3 hung4 jat2 lin4 gaa3?
examples.translation: How many public holidays longer than one day are there next year?

senses.definition: 依照特定時間表，輪流提供服務。喺啲需要長時間甚至廿四小時提供服務嘅行業，例如公共運輸、醫院、消防等等，通常會劃分工作時間表，例如將一日分開兩部分，一個職員負責上半部分時間嘅服務，另一個就負責下半部，咁樣就叫輪班制。有啲更加重要嘅服務，譬如消防，可能要求職員採取一日全日工作、兩日放假咁樣嘅輪班制。 (to work in shifts or in rotation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 醫生、護士等工作都需要輪班。
examples.jyutping: ji1 sang1, wu6 si6 dang2 gung1 zok3 dou1 seoi1 jiu3 leon4 baan1.
examples.translation: Jobs like doctors and nurses, etc. are required to work in shifts.

senses.definition: 書刊報章等文字媒體，依內容、性質區分嘅版面（量詞：個） (column)

examples.translation: advertisement column

senses.definition: 即柳橙。「橙」喺台語入面同「丁」發音相近而被寫成別字。 (orange)

senses.definition: 快樂嘅園地 (paradise)

senses.definition: 遊樂場 (park, amusement park)

senses.definition: 由流感病毒引致嘅急性呼吸道傳染病，簡稱#流感；病徵包括發燒、咳嗽、喉嚨痛、流鼻水、肌肉痛、疲倦同頭痛，亦可能出現嘔吐、腹瀉等等，透過患者#咳嗽、#打乞嗤、#飛沫，又或者直接接觸患者分泌物傳播 (influenza; flu)

examples.translation: Being apart from the whole and left behind

senses.definition: 講嘢嘅時候，為咗#拗 贏對方而扭曲事實 (to twist the truth or to make something out of nothing in order to win an argument)

senses.definition: 以特別嘅眼光或者態度相待，以示重視或歧視。 (to regard somebody with special respect)

senses.definition: #閃電 同佢發出嘅巨響嘅合稱（量詞：場） (thunder and lightning)

examples.text: 啲遊客亂抌垃圾，個沙灘就變垃圾崗。

examples.translation: Everyone says there is going to be a property market crash this year.

senses.definition: 臨時演員，多數飾演啲冇咩對白、無關重要嘅小角色 (an "extra" in a film, someone hired a very minor role, e.g. in crowd scenes)

senses.definition: 辨別是非嘅能力 (reason; intellect)

senses.definition: 用條脷舐女性嘅陰部 (to perform cunnilingus)

examples.translation: This time we must be in big trouble!

senses.definition: 響一個競爭環境之中，雙方都無咩大進展，奪而復失，失而復得，雙方得失來回往復 ((lit.) to move in a seesaw manner; (fig.) to struggle back and forth; to be locked in a seesaw struggle)

#沖繩 嘅古稱 (Ryukyu

senses.definition: 用火將金屬變硬或者更加精純 (to smelt metal with fire)

驚到打冷震（台山話借詞） (to tremble; to be afraid (borrowed from Toishanese))

senses.definition: 努力咁做嘢，希望達到一啲效果 (to try hard to; to strive to)

senses.definition: 十分之少；得返冇幾多 ((decent) very few)

senses.definition: 毒品名；學名叫「咪達唑侖」，本來係一種安眠藥，亦都有鎮靜嘅藥效；羅氏藥廠生產嘅版本就係藍色嘅藥丸，可能係個名嘅來源 (midazolam; Dormicum)
九廣鐵路嘅職員，特別係查飛員；本來查飛員嘅制服就係藍色嘅，所以俾人叫做藍精靈，後來所有職員都換咗藍色制服，個名就變成泛指九鐵嘅職員 (nickname for KCRC staff)

examples.translation: I have nothing against perfectionism, but sometimes it's wise not to force yourself too much. You know, as the saying goes, never bite off more than you can chew.

senses.definition: 祿山指唐代安祿山，相傳與楊貴妃私通，曾抓傷貴妃嘅乳房。《幼學瓊林．卷二．衣服類》：「貴妃之乳服訶子，為祿山之爪所傷。」注：「楊貴妃與安祿山私通，祿山以爪傷妃之乳。」後來借指偷襲、非禮女子胸部嘅男子嘅手。 (groping (use hand to illegally touch or fondle another person in a sexual way). Literally: General An Lu Shan's claws)
